byakuya-kuchiki.name: Byakuya Kuchiki
byakuya-kuchiki.quote: I have discarded my feelings long ago. The Kuchiki clan head cannot display emotions.
byakuya-kuchiki.description: The 28th head of the noble Kuchiki clan and Captain of Squad 6. Known for his cold demeanor and unwavering dedication to law and order, Byakuya struggles between his duties as a noble and his personal feelings. Byakuya is a Hybrid Range fighter who combines Melee combat with Ranged attacks and Kidō to dominate his foes. His Balanced playstyle allows him to control space effectively while maintaining offensive pressure with his two Stances, 'Senbonzakura Seal', and 'Senbonzakura Release'. With exceptional Range and Technique, moderate Defense, but lower Power and Speed, Byakuya excels at keeping opponents at bay while setting up devastating combos and unexpected snipe attacks.
byakuya-kuchiki.tldr: The Squad 6 Captain's Senbonzakura slices through foes. A technical fighter who can shift his ideal range. His Signature Move alters his Zanpakuto, enabling him to switch between close and ranged combat. In close combat, his 'Sealed Senbonzakura' is quick with high power, while in ranged combat his 'Released Senbonzakura' is slow but covers a large area. Switching between these enables you to use distance to your advantage. Once Awakened, he loses these options but his mid-range attack is powered up, letting you press forward in a superior state.

base.name: Exclusive Ability: Seal/Release Senbonzakura
base.description: An ability exclusive to Byakuya Kuchiki. This comes in two states: Sealed Senbonzakura, which emphasizes close-to mid-range combat, and Released Senbonzakura, which is suited for mid-to-long-range combat. You can switch between these two states in combat as the opponent or situation warrants.

base.name: Signature Move: Shikai
base.description: A Signature Move you can activate in Sealed Senbonzakura state. Transitions into Released Senbonzakura state.

base.name: Signature Move: Sakurashigure
base.description: A Signature Move you can activate in Released Senbonzakura state. Tap the Signature Move input to activate. Uses the blades of Senbonzakura to directly attack the opponent. Lets you follow up with an attack when it hits the opponent.

base.name: Signature Move: Seal
base.description: A Signature Move you can activate in Released Senbonzakura state. Hold the Signature Move input to activate. Transitions into Sealed Senbonzakura state.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Release - Senbonzakura
base.description: Spiritual Pressure Move 1 you can activate in Sealed Senbonzakura state. Attack the surrounding area while releasing Senbonzakura, sending the opponent flying. Changes to Released Senbonzakura state after activation.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Seal - Senbonzakura
base.description: Spiritual Pressure Move 1 you can activate in Released Senbonzakura state. Attack the surrounding area while sealing Senbonzakura, drawing the opponent toward you. Changes to Sealed Senbonzakura state after activation.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: That Won't Touch Me
base.description: Taking an attack in this stance triggers a counter, firing a Sokatsui. This move deals high damage and sends opponents flying.

base.name: Basic Flash Attack
base.description: Byakuya launches a single uppercut slash.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Hado #4 - Byakurai
base.description: Unleash a Byakurai straight forward. Has long range, making this a good move to keep foes at bay. Hold the input to launch a slightly stronger Byakurai with delayed activation.

base.name: Basic Quick Attack
base.description: Byakuya launches a single slash.

awakened.name: Awakening: Bankai - Senbonzakura Kageyoshi
awakened.description: Byakuya drops his blade into a portal ebbing from the ground, forming a row of blade columns behind him as they scatter into thousands of razor-sharp sakura petals.

awakened.name: Signature Move: Sakurashigure
awakened.description: Uses the blades of Senbonzakura to directly attack the opponent. Lets you follow up with up to two attacks when it hits the opponent.

awakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Senkei - Unsheathe
awakened.description: Form your blades into the shape of a sword to slash the opponent. Moves behind the opponent on hit for a follow-up combo attack.

awakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: That Won't Touch Me
awakened.description: Taking an attack in this stance triggers a counter, slashing your foe with Senbonzakura. This move deals high damage and sends opponents flying.

awakened.name: Basic Flash Attack
awakened.description: Moveset currently not known.

awakened.name: Special Flash Attack: Hado #4 - Byakurai
awakened.description: Unleash a Byakurai straight forward. Has long range, making this a good move to keep foes at bay. Hold the input to launch a slightly stronger Byakurai with delayed activation.

awakened.name: Basic Quick Attack
awakened.description: Moveset currently not known.

kikon.name: Normal State Kikon Move 1: Scatter, Senbonzakura
kikon.description: Destroys 2 Konpaku. Destroys 3 Konpaku with a Soul Break

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 1: Senkei, Senbonzakura Kageyoshi
kikon.description: Destroys 3 Konpaku. Destroys 4 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 2: Shūkei Hakuteiken
kikon.description: Destroys 4 Konpaku. Destroys 5 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

coyote-stark.name: Coyote Stark
coyote-stark.quote: I always envied the weak. Whenever we made friends, their souls would waste away just from being near us. Because we were so alone, we split our soul in two. I don't know which was our original form. Or perhaps, it was neither...
coyote-stark.description: The Primera Espada and the Aspect of Loneliness. Stark is a dangerous character that has two distinct changes between his Unawakened and Awakening forms; whilst Unawakened, Stark is a Long Range fighter that specialises in Ranged attacks, consuming his Reiatsu in exchange for his attacks. By using `The Two of Us Become One`, Stark can remove this detrimental trade-off to fire multiple powerful Ceros extremely quickly. The more Reiatsu that Stark has, the stronger, longer-lasting, and numerous his attacks become. Once performing his Awakening, Stark transitions into a Close Ranged fighter with Mid Range and Hybrid Range capabilities, expertly controlling distance with crushing Melee strikes and Ranged wolf attacks. These abilities now can cost Stark Konpaku ontop of Reiatsu, making the risk - but also the reward - far higher and sweeter.
coyote-stark.tldr: The Primera Espada is the strongest of his kind. Has unbeatable firepower and can split himself in two. Has high offensive power, turning Reiatsu and Konpaku into strength. In Normal State, attacks other than Quick Attacks consume Reiatsu. Running out of Reiatsu leaves him wide open. Charging Reiatsu with Spiritual Moves is essential to make use of his powerful long-range attacks.

base.name: Exclusive Ability: Offensive Spirit Energy Consumption
base.description: An ability exclusive to Stark. Dashing Quick Attack in addition to a Spiritual Pressure Move. Also consumes Reiatsu when an action is activated with the Flash Attack input. Without sufficient Reiatsu to activate the move, you will be left wide open.

base.name: Signature Move: Alma Carma
base.description: A move to focus and increase your Reiatsu. Continue focusing while the input is held and quickly replenish Reiatsu. The speed steadily increases the longer you hold the input.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Cero Automático
base.description: Consume 50 Reiatsu to move back and release a Cero. After it hits, release a follow-up Cero based on your remaining Reiatsu. You are invincible while moving backward, which can be used to avoid your opponent's attacks.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: The Two of Us Make One
base.description: Reiatsu overflows from your body, making you more powerful for a limited time. Reiatsu begins to decrease until it reaches 0 and the effects stop. Reiatsu cannot be increased while it is decreasing, but attack power goes up and all moves except Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Cero Automático cost 0 Reiatsu.

base.name: Basic Flash Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Cero Intenso
base.description: Consume a large amount of Reiatsu to unleash a powerful Cero. The longer the input is held, the slower yet stronger the Cero.

base.name: Basic Quick Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

awakened.name: Awakening: Generación de Manada de Lobos - Colmillo
awakened.description: Stark further merges his and Lilynette's soul back into one, as Stark and Lilynette's joint conciousness is then split between blade, body, and wolf. Stark dual-weilds their blades made of blue Reiryoku, Colmillo, in this form, transitioning into a short-ranged fighter that can summon powerful wolf-based attacks in exchange for trading not just their Spiritual Pressure, but also their Konpaku. Stark loses a lot of their long-ranged capabilities when Awakened.

awakened.name: Exclusive Ability: Blue Flame Wolf Stock
awakened.description: An ability exclusive to Stark. Some actions change if you have Blue Flame Wolf Stocks, and Stocks can be consumed to enter a state where you release powerful attacks.

awakened.name: Signature Move: Alma Carga
awakened.description: Consume 1 Konpaku to obtain 4 Blue Flame Wolf Stocks. If you only have 1 Konpaku, you'll be left wide open.

awakened.name: Signature Move: Lobos Casa
awakened.description: Alma Carga changes to this when you have Blue Flame Wolf Stocks. You can consume 1 Blue Flame Wolf Stock to send a wolf at the opponent and make it explode. If guarded, the wolf will fly away and you'll regain the Blue Flame Wolf Stock. Can be activated up to 2 times in a row.

awakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Solo Combinación
awakened.description: Changes to 'Lobos Combinación' if you have no Blue Flame Wolf Stock. Deals damage with successive slashes.

awakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Lobos Combinación
awakened.description: A close-range slashing attack. After landing the hit, 1 'Blue Flame Wolf Stock' is consumed to perform a follow-up with a wolf.

awakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: The Two of Us Make One
awakened.description: Increases Reiatsu. Gain 3 Blue Flame Wolf Stocks without consuming Konpaku.

awakened.name: Basic Flash Attack
awakened.description: Moveset currently not known.

awakened.name: Special Flash Attack: Whirling Rush
awakened.description: Twist into a stance and then quickly approach and assault the opponent. Hold the input to change to a consecutive attack that blasts the opponent away.

awakened.name: Basic Quick Attack
awakened.description: Moveset currently not known.

kikon.name: Normal State Kikon Move 1: Cero Metralleta
kikon.description: Destroys 2 Konpaku. Destroys 3 Konpaku with a Soul Break

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 1: Lobos Agresion
kikon.description: Destroys 4 Konpaku. Destroys 5 Konpaku with a Soul Break. Destroys 1 of your own Konpaku.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 2: Primera
kikon.description: Lobos Agresion changes to this at 3 or fewer Konpaku. Destroys 2 Konpaku. Destroys 3 Konpaku with a Soul Break

trivia: Stark is the first character to cover every range type, Short Range, Mid Range, Long Range and Hybrid Range. I am become Range; measurer of distance.
Stark's artwork pose is a reference to his appearance in Chapter 315: `March of the Death`.

gin-ichimaru.name: Gin Ichimaru
gin-ichimaru.quote: Feelings, eh? Nah, 'fraid not. Don't got none o' them. Didn't I tell ya, back when we first met? I'm a snake. Cold of flesh and devoid of heart. My tongue flicks back and forth, ever in search of new prey, and if I like what I find, I swallow 'em whole.
gin-ichimaru.description: The former Captain of Squad 3, known for his fox-like smile and mysterious nature. Behind his unsettling demeanor lies a centuries-long plot, making him one of Soul Society's most enigmatic figures. Gin is a Hybrid Range fighter combining Fast Melee attacks with devastating Charge moves. His Rushdown playstyle allows him to pressure opponents with quick, precise strikes and sudden extended-range attacks that can catch opponents by surprise. With excellent Speed and Range, moderate Technique, but lower Power and Defense, Gin excels at swift attacks while maintaining a safe distance with his unique Zanpakutō.
gin-ichimaru.tldr: Squad 3 Captain and wielder of the fastest Zanpakuto. Devastates with deadly strikes hidden amid violent flurries. Specializes in powerful mid-to-long-range actions that take advantage of his long reach. Attacks performed by extending his Shinso deliver high damage at the point of the blade. It's important to keep the point in striking distance. Doesn't have much Reishi, so victory depends on whether you can keep your opponent at a good distance.

base.name: Exclusive Ability: Sword Point
base.description: An ability exclusive to Gin Ichimaru. Deal additional damage to opponents when the tip of your blade hits during slash attacks. Hits with attacks closer to the hilt do less damage.

base.name: Exclusive Ability: Snake Possession
base.description: A signature upgrade state for Gin Ichimaru. Succeed with Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Urozuki to enter Snake Possession State for a limited time. The effect of Sword Point is powered up in Snake Possession State, and Shinsoku Hebizuki is improved.

base.name: Signature Move: Serpent Strike
base.description: Take a stance, point Shinso at the enemy and extend it instantly. The long attack range lets you attack from a distance. Hold the input to strengthen your attack and unleash a powerful thrust. You can use Step in this stance to cancel out of the action.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Urozuki
base.description: Take a stance facing away from the enemy. Taking an attack in this stance lets you counter by extending Shinso from the hip. Temporarily enters Snake Possession State upon successful counter.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Shinso Soken
base.description: Extend Shinso while dodging, swinging it in a wide arc forward. When the sweep hits, follows up by piercing the foe in mid-air. Activates quickly and has a wide attack range, making it viable in many ways, including as a combo finisher.

base.name: Basic Flash Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Assault
base.description: Step through an assault on the enemy while extending your Zanpakuto. The long step and long attack range let you approach and attack instantly from a distance.

base.name: Basic Quick Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

awakened.name: Awakening: Bankai - Kamishininoyari
awakened.description: Gin unleashes his Bankai, Kamishininoyari, cleaving through a swelling dust cloud 100 times faster than the speed of sound with an effortless swipe.

awakened.description: An ability exclusive to Gin Ichimaru. Deal additional damage to opponents when the tip of your blade hits during slash attacks. Hits with attacks closer to the hilt do less damage.

kikon.description: Destroys 2 Konpaku. Destroys 3 Konpaku with a Soul Break

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 1: Kamishininoyari - 'Dakatsusenjin'

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 2: Kamishininoyari - 'Butorenjin'

grimmjow-jaegerjaquez.name: Grimmjow Jaegerjaquez
grimmjow-jaegerjaquez.quote: I am the king! I'll crush anyone who thinks they're above me!
grimmjow-jaegerjaquez.description: The Sexta Espada, and the Aspect of Destruction. His feral nature and obsession with proving his dominance make him a fearsome opponent. Grimmjow's pride as a warrior and hunger as a vicious predator king drives him to seek ever-stronger opponents. As a Short Range fighter, he excels in Fast Melee combat with a relentless Rushdown playstyle. His 'Annihilation' Stance mechanics and 'Impulse' Gauge resource abilities reflect his predatory nature, allowing him to pressure opponents with devastating close-range combinations and surprsing power buffs. With exceptional Power, Speed, and Defense, but minimal Range and moderate Technique, Grimmjow dominates in close combat through sheer aggression and overwhelming force whilst mixing up his offensive with shifting stances.
grimmjow-jaegerjaquez.tldr: The Sexta Espada strives to excel for reasons all his own. Fights harder when at a disadvantage, turning the tide. Charging his personal Impulse Gauge puts him in Annihilation State and lets him overwhelm his foes with high attack power. Annihilation State changes his offensive capabilities, increasing combos and unleashing explosive battle power. The Impulse Gauge is charged when he takes damage or with his Signature Move. It can feel like a waiting game until the Impulse Gauge is fully charged, but then he can turn the tide at the end of battle to seize victory.

base.name: Exclusive Ability: Impulse Gauge
base.description: An ability exclusive to Grimmjow. This Gauge fills up by using Preparación, which deals Reishi Damage. Fill the gauge to enter Annihilation State.

base.name: Exclusive Ability: Annihilation State
base.description: An ability exclusive to Grimmjow. Attacks are powered up and some actions change until the gauge runs out.

base.name: Signature Move: Preparación
base.description: Build rage to amplify the Impulse Gauge. Holding the input continues to charge the Impulse Gauge.

base.name: Signature Move: Giland Patada
base.description: Preparación changes into this during Annihilation State. Attacks the opponent with a roundhouse kick. Gets a Guard Point until the attack activates, letting you attack while fending off the opponent's attack.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Cero
base.description: Rush forward and rake upward into a Cero blast. Activates quickly and moves you forward somewhat, making it perfect for a combo finisher.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Kill Them, Spare No One
base.description: Detonate your rage, temporarily entering a Decimation State, a state with effects above Annihilation State. During Decimation State, moves enhanced by Annihilation State are changed into even stronger versions. Each attack with recoil decreases your Reishi slightly.

base.name: Basic Flash Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Leap
base.description: Leap straight ahead, rushing into a crushing claw attack. Annihilation State changes this into a devastating attack that also causes damage during the rush.

base.name: Basic Quick Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

awakened.name: Awakening: Resurrección - Pantera
awakened.description: Grimmjow rips at his Zanpakuto before summoning forth a vortex of dust, his roar establishing his right to the throne and shredding the dust cloud away with his voice alone, as he stands, ready to prove his might in his new panther-like form.

ichigo-kurosaki-bankai.name: Ichigo Kurosaki (Bankai)
ichigo-kurosaki-bankai.quote: I'm not fighting because I want to win, I'm fighting because I have to win!
ichigo-kurosaki-bankai.description: The evolved form of Ichigo's power, representing his mastery over his Shinigami abilities. In this state, his already formidable powers are compressed into a sleeker form, though the darkness that roars within him grows alongside his strength. As a Hybrid Range fighter, Bankai Ichigo combines Fast Melee combat with devastating Ranged attacks, utilizing both Charge moves and his unique 'Getsuga Aura' Gauge. He is also one of the few characters in the game who has access to a Reawakening. His Rushdown playstyle becomes even more aggressive, with the ability to Revive from near-death situations, leading to his Reawakening into his Full Hollowfication, where Ichigo becomes practically unstoppable. With balanced stats favoring Technique, Ichigo can adapt to any situation while maintaining constant pressure on his opponents.
ichigo-kurosaki-bankai.tldr: A Substitue Shinigami who quickly overwhelms foes. Those in Soul Society recognize him as an agent of destiny. Has multiple easy-to-use actions, such as his projectile Signature Move and Spiritual Pressure Move 1 with invincibility. Use Spiritual Pressure Move 2, Getsuga Aura to greatly strengthen every attack for a limited time. Use safe moves to charge Reiatsu and then overpower your opponent when the time is right. Reawakens automatically if defeated when Awakened with fully charged Fighting Spirit.

base.name: Exclusive Ability: Getsuga Aura State
base.description: A signature upgrade state for Ichigo Kurosaki (Bankai). Entering Getsuga Aura State adds a Getsuga Aura Gauge and powers up your attacks. The Getsuga Aura Gauge goes down when you attack or receive enemy attacks.

base.name: Signature Move: Getsugatensho
base.description: Takes a stance before unleashing a Getsugatensho forward. Hold the input for a more powerful slash wave. Always unleashes a powerful slash wave in Getsuga Aura State.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Full Swing Strike
base.description: Strike a low stance before unleashing a brutal rising slash. You're invincible during the startup, letting you trigger this move to fend off attacks.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Getsuga Aura
base.description: Imbue Tensa Zangetsu with Spiritual Pressure to wreathe your blade in a Getsuga. You enter Getsuga Aura State after using this move, strengthening various attacks.

base.name: Basic Flash Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Rushing Stab
base.description: A thrust while rushing forward. Lets you close in on your foe while attacking. Useful for offense, but puts you at a disadvantage when guarded. Can use additional attacks on hit and allows for a Quick Attack follow-up in Getsuga Aura State.

base.name: Basic Quick Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

awakened.name: Awakening: Hollowfication
awakened.description: Ichigo rips at his face, drawing black and red Reiryoku as his Hollowfication is donned.

reawakened.name: Reawakening: Full Hollowfication
reawakened.description: Ichigo lies dead, suddenly grasping the ground as Reireyoku collates around him, rising once more like a demon unleashed from the bowels of Hell itself. As Ichigo raises his arched back, he stands ferocious, ready to rip and tear his foe to shreds.

reawakened.name: Signature Move: Cero
reawakened.description: Unleashes a Cero forward. The projectile is extremely fast, making it a powerful way to keep foes at bay at mid-range.

reawakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Rising Slash
reawakened.description: Strike a low stance, charge into a tackle forward and unleash a brutal rising slash. You're invincible during the tackle, letting you trigger this move to fend off attacks.

reawakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: I Will Protect You
reawakened.description: Charge up and viciously grab your foe (Breaker-type). Releases your Spiritual Pressure on hit to land a devastating attack. The grab is unblockable, letting you break the opponent's guard to deal massive damage.

reawakened.name: Basic Flash Attack
reawakened.description: Moveset currently not known.

reawakened.name: Special Flash Attack: Rush Attack
reawakened.description: A thrust while rushing forward. Lets you close in on your foe while attacking. Unleashes a powerful follow-up on hit.

reawakened.name: Basic Quick Attack
reawakened.description: Moveset currently not known.

kikon.description: Destroys 2 Konpaku. Destroys 3 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 1: Point-Blank Getsugatensho

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 2: Grand Getsugatensho

kikon.name: Reawakened Kikon Move 1: Cero Beam
kikon.description: Destroys 4 Konpaku. Destroys 5 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

ichigo-kurosaki-final.name: Ichigo Kurosaki (Final Getsugatensho)
ichigo-kurosaki-final.quote: Why so surprised? Does it scare you..? Seeing something that you can't comprehend happening right before your eyes..?
ichigo-kurosaki-final.description: Ichigo Kurosaki (Final Getsugatensho) is the ultimate form of Ichigo Kurosaki's Shinigami and Hollow powers, coalescing into a perfect, transcendant form. In this state, he embodies Getsuga itself, and bends the rules of reality to his will. Ichigo Kurosaki (Final Getsugatensho) is unique from every other character in the game as a Concluder, in the sense that his Kikon Moves do not claim Konpaku, and he does not have an Awakening or Reawakening. After hitting two Kikon Moves, Ichigo unlocks his ultimate, final Kikon Move, 'Mugetsu', which instantly wins the Match. This is mechanic is called 'Conclusion'.
ichigo-kurosaki-final.tldr: With a single strike, he severed it all. Marking an end to his life as a Substitute Shinigami. Has a special Kikon Move and fights with no Awakened State. Movements are slow, but all moves gain power with each Kikon Move hit.

base.name: Exclusive Ability: Conclusion
base.description: Unique ability of Ichigo Kurosaki (Final Getsugatensho). Land Kikon Moves 3 times to automatically with the battle. Your 'Conclusion Count' increases each time you hit with a Kikon Move, enhancing all moves.

base.name: Signature Move: Abrupt Throw
base.description: Slice your foe, then grab them by the face and throw them. The slice is unblockable, letting you break the opponent's guard to deal damage. Does low damage, but builts a lot of Reiatsu.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Gargantuan Spiritual Pressure
base.description: Stick out your left arm to block an attack. Take an attack during this stance to move behind your foe, transitioning into a slash attack.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Power To Protect Everyone
base.description: Take a stance, then rapidly close in and unleash a thrust at your foe. A mighty move perfect for a combo finisher.

base.name: Basic Flash Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

base.name: Special Flash Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

base.name: Basic Quick Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

kikon.name: Conclusion Kikon Move 1: Absolute Declaration
kikon.description: Ichigo teleports and slashes his foe, leaving them paralyzed with fear at his incomprehensible might. Level 1 Kikon Move. Cannot destroy Konpaku.

kikon.name: Conclusion Kikon Move 2: Unknown Manifestation
kikon.description: Ichigo teleports a second time and slashes his foe, leaving them panicked with fear at his impossible presence. Level 2 Kikon Move. Cannot destroy Konpaku.

kikon.name: Conclusion Kikon Move 3: Mugetsu
kikon.description: Ichigo clads himself in the essence of Getsuga itself, wrapping around him in dark blue wrappings and extending his hair into a thick, black mane. He gains a mask of wrappings, as his Zanpakuto disappears, generating all of Ichigo's Shinigami powers into a single, thin blade of wispy, black Reiryoku. Ichigo swings this blade effortlessly, firing an incomprehensible slice of black Reiryoku, as his foe is ruptured by an impossible power. Level 3 Kikon Move. Destroys all of the opponent's Konpaku, winning the battle. This Kikon Move also negates revival abilities.
kikon.input: KI (After using `Conclusion Kikon Move 1` & `Conclusion Kikon Move 2`)

baseCombos.name: Community Combo: Fading Moonstorm Pressure
baseCombos.description: Expend most of Ichigo's Reiatsu and Reverse whilst at Conclusion Count 2 & Spirit Drive to pressure the opponent with a barrage of teleporting strikes, as if Ichigo was fading from existence with each strike to fully optimise his offensive slashes. Created by '@enkiduofclay'.

trivia: Ichigo Kurosaki (Final Getsugatensho) is the only character to deviate from the Awakening, Reawakening, and Kikon systems, instead adopting the Conclusion system, which prevents Ichigo from Awakening, Reawakening, and claiming Konpaku with his Kikon Moves (Excluding Mugetsu).

ichigo-kurosaki.name: Ichigo Kurosaki
ichigo-kurosaki.quote: ...If fate is a millstone, then we are the grist. There is nothing we can do. So I wish for strength. If I cannot protect them from the wheel, then give me a strong blade, and enough strength... to shatter fate.
ichigo-kurosaki.description: A young man from Karakura Town; a fateful encounter changes his life forever, placing him on the arduous path of a Substitute Shinigami - His desire to protect his friends is absolute, and unbreakable. Ichigo is a Short Range fighter who excels in Melee combat with a Rushdown playstyle. His aggressive approach and powerful strikes make him an intimidating opponent at close range. With exceptional Power and Defense, but lower Speed and Range, Ichigo must close the distance to be effective. His moderate Technique and Charge attacks allow for some tactical flexibility in combat. Be wary of his Augmentor abilities, as when Ichigo uses Reverse, he can drastically change his abilities.
ichigo-kurosaki.tldr: A Substitute Shinigami who harbors a hidden power. Uses both blade and fist to strike fast and strong. Can make simple-yet-strong attacks, packing a punch in close-range combat. Perform Reverse Actions to enter a special enhanced state. With the right timing, Reverse Actions can unleash powerful bursts of strength.

abilities.abilityQuote: Retreat and you will age. Be afraid and you will die. Now shout my name..!

base.name: Exclusive Ability: Lend Me Your Strength
base.description: Ichigo Kurosaki's signature Reverse Action effect. His Reverse Action is always a Soul Reverse. As an additional effect, his basic abilities power up and some of his actions change.

base.name: Signature Move: Charge Slash
base.description: A power-packed slash forward. Hold the input to unleash an even stronger slash. If charged to maximum, you still follow-up with a slash when it's blocked.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: All-Out Slash
base.description: A charge, then a powerful slashing rush. Combos into a rising slash on hit. A mighty move perfect for a combo finisher.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Flying Slash
base.description: Changes by activating 'All-Out Slash' during 'Lend Me Your Strength'. Unleash a massive slash forward. The slash can nullify some opponent projectiles. A mighty move perfect for a combo finisher.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Wielding
base.description: Swing Zangetsu around to attack. Combos into a powerful strike on hit. You're invincible during the startup, letting you trigger this move to fend off attacks.

base.name: Basic Flash Attack
base.description: Ichigo lashes with a singular, powerful slice.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Rush Attack
base.description: Attacks while rushing forward. Lets you close in on your foe while attacking.

base.name: Basic Quick Attack
base.description: Poke at your foe with a single slice.

awakened.name: Awakening: Bankai - Tensa Zangetsu
awakened.description: Ichigo holds Zangetsu pointed towards his foe, as he bellows out his Bankai's release, calling upon a torrent of dust and wind to surround him as his form changes, his Shihakusho warping into a slender, ragged robe; his blade manifesting as a pitch-black katana, erupting with the fury of Getsuga.

awakened.name: Exclusive Ability: You're No Good At All!
awakened.description: Ichigo Kurosaki's signature Reverse Action effect. His Reverse Action is always a Soul Reverse. As an additional effect, his basic abilities power up and some of his actions change.

awakened.name: Signature Move: Rush Slash
awakened.description: Take a stance, then teleport in front of the opponent for a surprise attack. Takes time to unleash, but shortens the distance to your foe in an instance. Hold the input for a more powerful surprise attack.

awakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Can You Keep Up?
awakened.description: Take a stance, then rush in for a slash. Combos into a combo so fast it's invisible to the naked eye on hit. A mighty move perfect for a combo finisher.

awakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Getsugatensho
awakened.description: Changes by activating 'Can You Keep Up?' during 'You're No Good At All!'. Unleash a double-Getsugatensho barrage forward. Getsugatensho can nullify some projectiles. A mighty move perfect for a combo finisher.

awakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Rapid Slash
awakened.description: Charge up to unleash a rising slash. Showers your foe in countless instantaneous slashes on hit. You're invincible during the startup, letting you trigger this move to fend off attacks.

awakened.name: Basic Flash Attack
awakened.description: Loose a trio of vicious slashes.

awakened.name: Special Flash Attack: Forward Slash
awakened.description: Attacks while rushing forward slightly. Lets you close in on your foe while attacking. Additional inputs during this move let you use up to two follow-up attacks.

awakened.name: Basic Quick Attack
awakened.description: Moveset currently not known.

kikon.name: Normal State Kikon Move 1: Getsuga Sign
kikon.description: Destroys 2 Konpaku. Destroys 3 Konpaku with a Soul Break. Destroys 3 Konpaku while 'Lend Me Your Strength' is active. Destroys 4 Konpaku while 'Lend Me Your Strength' is active with a Soul Break.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 1: Instant Slash
kikon.description: Destroys 3 Konpaku. Destroys 4 Konpaku with a Soul Break. Destroys 4 Konpaku while 'You're No Good At All!' is active. Destroys 5 Konpaku while 'You're No Good At All!' is active with a Soul Break.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 2: Full-Power Slash
kikon.description: Destroys 4 Konpaku. Destroys 5 Konpaku with a Soul Break. Cannot be activated while 'You're No Good At All!' is active.

baseCombos.name: Basic Quick Attack Combo
baseCombos.description: String together a combo of five slashes, ending in a final crescent slice.

baseCombos.name: Basic Flash Attack Combo
baseCombos.description: Mix a downwards slice with a horizontal slash, ending in an uppercut.

baseCombos.name: Special Flash Attack Combo
baseCombos.description: Barrel into a shoulder shove, transitioning into a slice.

awakenedCombos.name: Basic Quick Attack Combo
awakenedCombos.description: A swift lashing of four quick slices.

awakenedCombos.name: Basic Flash Attack Combo
awakenedCombos.description: Ichigo teleports at hyperspeed, slicing the foe 7 times in a row in a flurry.

awakenedCombos.name: Special Flash Attack Combo
awakenedCombos.description: Ichigo dashes into a dual-slash, before spinning into a final slice.

trivia: At the first portion of the Main Story, Ichigo fights with a gigantic, bare Zanpakuto before he obtains Zangetsu.
In the Main Story, whilst confronting White for the first time, Ichigo fights with a bare Asauchi, with an ovular tsuba.
Ichigo was the first character to get a Character Trailer.
Ichigo was the first character to appear in Bleach - Resource of Souls' Announcement Trailer.

ikkaku-madarame.name: Ikkaku Madarame
ikkaku-madarame.quote: I want to fight, I want to become stronger. It's simple as that!
ikkaku-madarame.description: 3rd Seat of Squad 11 who secretly achieved Bankai. A battle-loving warrior who follows Zaraki's philosophy of seeking strong opponents, while hiding his true power to remain in his preferred position. Incredibly lucky and proudly bald. As a Short Range fighter, he combines Fast Melee combat with unique triple-Stance mechanics through his three-part Zanpakutō, Hōzukimaru. After Awakening, his 'Ryūmon' Gauge builds up as he maintains offensive pressure, providing further buffs, while his Rushdown playstyle allows him to overwhelm opponents with relentless attacks. With high Power and Speed, but lower Range, Defense, and Technique, Ikkaku excels at aggressive combat that rewards luck, maintaining offensive momentum through careful stance management, and constant pressure.
ikkaku-madarame.tldr: Third Seat of Squad 11 and luckiest of Soul Society. Controls both pace and proximity in close-range battles. Has more moves than other characters and a wider range of actions to choose from. His many close-range moves enable you to press the attack. Single attacks deal low Reishi damage, so a vigorous offensive is necessary to win.

base.name: Signature Move: Slayer Stance
base.description: Take a crouching stance while activating Hozukimaru. Activate different moves from this stance depending on if a Quick Attack, Flash Attack, Signature Move or Step input it pressed. You get a Guard Point when you take this stance during the effects of Spritual Pressure Move 2: Watch Closely.

base.name: Signature Move: Rush Strike
base.description: Input a Flash Attack to leap forward to unleash a forceful thrust. Activates quickly and forcefully closes distances, giving it a variety of uses. This gets stronger and gains invincibility against projectile attacks while moving during the effects of Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Watch Closely.

base.name: Signature Move: Cleave Strike
base.description: Input a Quick Attack for a sweeping attack in front of you. Very powerful, and grants you the advantage even when guarded. Can combo into a Flash Attack on hit. During the effects of Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Watch Closely, this gets stronger and gets a Guard Point until the attack activates.

base.name: Signature Move: Counter Strike
base.description: Input a Dash to take an even deeper stance to fend off opponent attacks. Taking an attack triggers a counter. This counter gets dramatically stronger during the effects of Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Watch Closely.

base.name: Signature Move: Undo Stance
base.description: Input a Signature Move input to undo 'Slayer Stance'.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: It's My Lucky Day!
base.description: A powered-up Slayer Stance. Just like Signature Move: Slayer Stance, using a Quick Attack, Flash Attack, Signature Move or Step input activates different moves from this stance. Gain a Guard Point when you take this stance during the effects of Spiritual Pressure 2: Watch Closely.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Rush Strike Kai
base.description: Input a Flash Attack to leap forward and unleash a devastating thrust. Activates quickly, making it perfect for a combo finisher. This gets stronger and gains invincibility against projectile attacks while moving during the effects of Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Watch Closely.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Cleave Strike Kai
base.description: Input a Quick Attack for a fierce sweeping attack in front of you. Very powerful, and grants you the advantage even when guarded. Can combo into a Flash Attack on hit. During the effects of Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Watch Closely, this gets stronger and gets a Guard Point until the attack activates.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Counter Strike Kai
base.description: Input a Dash to take an even deeper stance to fend off opponent attacks. Taking an attack triggers a powerful counter. This counter gets dramatically stronger during the effects of Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Watch Closely..

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Undo Stance
base.description: Input a Signature Move input to undo 'It's My Lucky Day!'.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Watch Closely
base.description: Enjoy the battle, strengthening yourself for a brief period. Strengthens Signature Move: Slayer Stance, Spiritual Pressure Move 1: It's My Lucky Day, and actions transitioning from these moves.

base.name: Basic Flash Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Getaway Thrust
base.description: Back Step before rushing in quickly for a stab. Can be used to dodge before unleashing your own point-blank attack. Can transition quickly into Slayer Stance or a Step when it hits the opponent or their guard.

base.name: Basic Quick Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

awakened.name: Awakening: Bankai - Ryūmon Hōzukimaru
awakened.description: Ikkaku spins Hōzukimaru above his head, yelling out as he releases his Bankai; his Shihakusho's top half becomes shed, as he gains a gigantic axe-head that floats behind him, adorned with a dragon, connected to two massive cleavers that Ikkaku holds; after Awakening, Ikkaku gets access to the `Ryūmon Gauge`, which increases by attacking Ikkaku's opponent or by taking damage. The higher the Gauge, the more damage Ikkaku deals.

awakened.name: Exclusive Ability: Ryumon Gauge
awakened.description: A gauge exclusive to Ikkaku Madarame. Fills when you deal damage to an opponent's Reishi or take damage yourself. Your attacks do more damage the more the Ryumon Gauge is filled.

kikon.name: Normal State Kikon Move 1: Split Apart, Hozukimaru!
kikon.description: Destroys 2 Konpaku. Destroys 3 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 1: Time To Have Me Some Fun!
kikon.description: Destroys 3 Konpaku. Destroys 4 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 2: Remember My Name
kikon.description: Destroys 4 Konpaku. Destroys 5 Konpaku with a Soul Break. Destroys 5 Konpaku when the Ryumon Gauge is maxed out. Destroys 6 Konpaku when the Ryumon Gauge is maxed out with a Soul Break.

izuru-kira.name: Izuru Kira
izuru-kira.quote: The weight of the lives I've taken, the pain that I've caused... I carry it with me every day.
izuru-kira.description: Lieutenant of Squad 3, Kira is a deeply philosophical warrior whose Zanpakutō reflects his melancholic nature. His loyalty was tested by his Captain's betrayal, leaving him to rebuild both his division and his confidence. As a Short Range fighter, he combines Melee combat with unique Zoner abilities, letting him pull opponents towards him; utilizing Gimmick mechanics through his Zanpakutō Wabisuke's ability 'Weight Multiplication', Izuru is able to slow his opponents and cripple their defenses. His methodical playstyle focuses on gradually wearing down opponents while maintaining defensive positioning - With exceptional Technique, good Range and Defense, but low Power and Speed, Izuru excels at tactical combat that punishes aggressive opponents through careful ability usage.
izuru-kira.tldr: The Squad 3 Lieutenant, who carries a hidden sadness. Movements grow slower as this despair intensifies. Has a notable Signature Move that pulls in an opponent after attacking once and enables additional hits. If the Signature Move lands, your opponent will be forced to act without escape. Doesn't do much damage, so you'll need to continually outmaneuver your opponent while dealing damage in order to win.

base.name: Signature Move: Bakudo #4 - Hainawa
base.description: Unleash Hainawa in front of you. Changes on hit depending on if the input is held. You can combo into this from various moves.

base.name: Signature Move: Snatch
base.description: Transition into this move by holding the input on a hit with Bakudo #4 - Hainawa. Pull on the Hainawa to draw the enemy toward you. Can be canceled with a Special Flash Attack or Step after pulling in the enemy.

base.name: Signature Move: Hado #11 - Tsuzuri Raiden
base.description: A variation of Bakudo #4 - Hainawa (Release the input on hit). Send a Tsuzuri Raiden along the Hainawa to damage the enemy.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Jujokenmai
base.description: Take a stance, then step in and slice your foe. Transitions to a combo attack when it hits the opponent.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Bakudo #61 - Rikujokoro
base.description: Incants Bakudo #61 - Rikujokoro and fires it at the opponent. Unblockable, and temporarily binds the enemy on hit.

base.name: Basic Flash Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Bakudo #39 - Enkosen
base.description: Deploy Enkosen to fend off opponent attacks. Taking an attack while this is deployed triggers a combo counter with your Zanpakuto.

base.name: Basic Quick Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

awakened.name: Awakening: Shikai - Wabisuke
awakened.description: Izuru snaps his blade downwards, wrenching it into a grotesque, terrifying form fit for execution. The sword's cutting edge bends inwards into a hook-shape, much like a reverse guillotine. Izuru's killing intent and the weight of his sorrow emanate throughout the area, the gravity of the battle weighing both combatants down.

awakened.name: Exclusive Ability: Wabisuke Count
awakened.description: Izuru Kira's signature ability. Confers a Wabisuke Count for each slash landed with Wabisuke. Weighed Down triggers when Jujokenmai or Bakudo #61 - Rikujokoro hits.

awakened.name: Exclusive Ability: Weighed Down
awakened.description: The signature ability of Izuru Kira. Triggers when Jujokenmai or Bakudo #61 - Rikujokoro hits. Temporarily reduces enemy movement speed when activated, and increases the number of Konpaku destroyed by 'Hence...'. A more powerful Weighed Down is triggered in proportion to the Wabisuke Count when this is activated.

kikon.name: Normal State Kikon Move 1: Hado #58 - Tenran
kikon.description: Destroys 2 Konpaku. Destroys 3 Konpaku with a Soul Break..

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 1: Hence...
kikon.description: Destroys 2 Konpaku. Destroys 3 Konpaku with a Soul Break.. More Konpaku can be destroyed when Weighed Down is active, up to 5 Konpaku depending on the level, and up to 6 Konpaku depending on the level with a Soul Break.

kaien-shiba.name: Kaien Shiba
kaien-shiba.quote: The heart isn't something inside you. But whenever you think, whenever you remember someone, that's when the heart is born.
kaien-shiba.description: The Lieutenant of Squad 13, a charismatic and upbeat individual responsible for mentoring Rukia Kuchiki, and is a beloved member of his Squad, dilligently serving Jushiro Ukitake. Kaien starts the match in the `Normal Stance (A)`, but as the match kicks off, Kaien's kit emerges, revolving around his `Current Aura State Stance (B)` - By landing his Signature Move `Tumbling Current` or his Spiritual Pressure Move `Sorei Suiha`, he enters the `Current Aura State Stance (B)` - When in this Stance, his `Current Aura State Gauge` is consumed slowly, as Kaien deals more damage, lands more hits, and deals more Guard Gauge damage whilst the Gauge still has resources.
kaien-shiba.tldr: Former Squad 13 Lieutenant with a warm smile. Controls the flow of battle with superior technique. Can battle from afar by taking advantage of his attack reach. His Dashing Quick Attacks have great distance and speed. His Flash Attacks also move in a lot, letting him hit from far away. You can play aggressively since his Special Flash ATtacks (when charged) leave only a small opening even when they're guarded.

abilities.abilityQuote: Rage Through the Seas and Heavens

base.name: Exclusive Ability: Water Aura State
base.description: State exclusive to Kaien Shiba. Filling the Water Aura Gauge enables you to enter Water Aura State. All attacks are strengthened and the duration of time needed to activate Kansui is reduced. Continues until Water Aura Gauge reaches 0%.

base.name: Signature Move: Wakimizu
base.description: Spin the spear from a high stance and envelop it in water to attack. Once enveloped in water, stab the tip into the ground for an area attack. Hold the input to increase the length of the water spear. Afterwards the Water Aura Gauge is boosted based on how long it was held.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Sakanami
base.description: Stab while twisting, then launch into the air with an upward slash. Provides invincibility until complete, so can be performed to neutralize attacks from the opponent.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Sorei Suiha
base.description: Thrust forward as if sliding on the ground. Hitting the opponent transitions to an attack with a Water Aura. Water Aura State then continues for a long period after attacking.

base.name: Basic Flash Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Kansui
base.description: Brandish your spear and perform a powerful thrust. Hold the input to extend its reach. When fully charged it transforms into an attack that pierces through the opponent. Landing a fully charged attack enables a follow-up Flash Attack.

base.name: Basic Quick Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

awakened.name: Awakening: Shikai - Nejibana
awakened.description: Kaien twirls Nejibana around in a circle, flowing water from it in a marvellous ring before pointing his spear at his foe, unlocking Nejibana's full potential.

awakened.description: Brandish your spear and perform a powerful thrust. Hold the input to extend its reach. When fully charged it transforms into an attack that pierces through the opponent. Landing a fully charged attack enables a follow-up Flash Attack.

awakened.name: Basic Quick Attack
awakened.description: Moveset currently not known.

kikon.description: Destroys 2 Konpaku. Destroys 3 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 1: Hado #63 - Raikōhō
kikon.description: Destroys 3 Konpaku. Destroys 4 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 2: Suika Tensho'
kikon.description: Destroys 4 Konpaku. Destroys 5 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

kaname-tosen.name: Kaname Tōsen
kaname-tosen.quote: My eyes can only see one path, and that is the path with the least bloodshed.
kaname-tosen.description: Former Captain of Squad 9 who follows Aizen despite his strong sense of justice. Blind since birth, Tōsen's pursuit of justice is paradoxically driven by a desire for revenge, leading him down a path of betrayal. As a Short Range fighter, he combines Melee combat with unique Ranged abilities, utilizing Gimmick mechanics that reflect his unique sensory abilities - After Awakening, his Bankai, 'Suzumushi Tsuishiki: Enma Korogi', activats his core Gimmick mechanic, which transports both players to a new arena temporarily and restricts the opponents' field of vision. His Trickster playstyle allows him to disorient opponents while setting up devastating combinations. With high Technique, moderate Speed and Defense, but lower Power and Range, Tōsen excels at confusing opponents before striking with precise attacks.
kaname-tosen.tldr: The misanthropic and righteous Squad 9 Captain. His counters are enhanced by sharpened perceptions. Uses hit-and-run actions and once Awakened creates a personal barrier that obstructs the opponent's vision. Suited for predicting opponents' attacks and using Flash Attacks to fall back and then fly forward, or using his Signature Move to ward off attacks and counter. Once Awakened he cannot be seen by opponents, so try using Flash Attacks to strike at unprepared foes, or launch a powerful offensive with Breakers to achieve victory.

base.name: Signature Move: Transcendence
base.description: Wield your blade to fend off attacks. Taking a close-range attack in this stance triggers a backstab counter behind your opponent. The counter part earns a lot of Reiatsu.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Suzumushi Nishiki, Benihiko
base.description: Hurl a Benihiko while jumping backward. Fast activation, and the very beginning of the move has invincibility frames, letting you attack while fending off the opponent.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Sayabane
base.description: Wield your blade in a low stance before rushing the opponent. Hitting the opponent before the rush transitions to a slicing attack. Taking an attack while rushing transitions into a powerful attack hurling a Benihiko.

base.name: Basic Flash Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Issen
base.description: Move backward quickly before stepping in for a flash. The very beginning of the move has invincibility frames, letting you attack while fending off the opponent.

base.name: Basic Quick Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

awakened.name: Awakening: Bankai - Suzumushi Tsuishiki, Enma Korogi
awakened.description: Tōsen spawns a circular metal hoop infront of him, as he flips it downwards, and spreads it into five other clones, tossing them around the arena. The rings spew with a vicious darkness, blanketing the area with a black orb - This orb robs Tōsen's foes of their senses of sight, hearing, smell and taste, but leaves their sense of touch intact.

awakened.name: Exclusive Ability: Bankai - Suzumushi Tsuishiki, Enma Korogi
awakened.description: A signature Awakened state for Kaname Tōsen. Covers the field in Bankai: Enma Korogi, plunging the opponent into a hellish emptiness. After activation, the opponent is unable to see Tōsen from a certain distance which gradually expands over time, or through combat. The range is reset if Kaname Tōsen successfully lands a Kikon Move. This Exclusive Ability is unable to be performed on an opposing Kaname Tōsen, as he is blind, and instead shows both players.

kenpachi-zaraki.name: Kenpachi Zaraki
kenpachi-zaraki.quote: The only ones who should kill are those who are prepared to be killed!
kenpachi-zaraki.description: The fearsome Captain of Squad 11 and the 11th Kenpachi, who lives solely for the thrill of battle. Zaraki gained his position by killing his predecessor, and leads the most combat-oriented division in the Gotei 13, wearing an eye patch to limit his overwhelming power to extend his fights intentionally. Zaraki is a Short Range fighter specializing in Slow but devastating Melee combat. His Berserker playstyle and Stance mechanics reflect his love of battle and self-imposed limitations. With maximum Power and Defense, decent Speed, but minimal Range and Technique, Zaraki is an unstoppable force once he gets close to his opponents, or lands a hellish Charge attack.
kenpachi-zaraki.tldr: Squad 11 Captain and heir to the 'Kenpachi' moniker. His great strength grows in tandem with that of his foes. Very offense-focused, with massive attack that can be boosted to the point it becomes difficult to wield. Although slow, he can power through enemy strikes with his Super Armor to land hits. His Signature Move that boosts power when he gets hit and the strength of his Awakened Kikon Move 2 make it easy to bounce back from a weak position.

base.name: Exclusive Ability: Spiritual Pressure Amplification
base.description: An ability exclusive to Kenpachi Zaraki. The fewer Konpaku he has left, the more Spiritual Pressure he gains, the more his attack strength is boosted.

base.name: Signature Move: I Can Take It!
base.description: Prepare as if to taunt opponent. Hold the input to stand ready, then release it to perform a slash to the front. You have Super Armor and won't flinch from enemy attacks while holding this stance. Release after being attacked to make the move more powerful. The more damage received, the greater the power.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Chop You Up
base.description: Release an all-out attack. High power and covers a wide area, so can be used to follow-up on opponents that have been knocked away.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Nothing I Can't Cut
base.description: Once prepared, cuts down the opponent in a sudden forward movement. You are invincible while moving forward, so it can be performed even in the face of a head-on attack. Hold the input to fully charge it and make the move unguardable.

base.name: Basic Flash Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Thrust
base.description: Thrust blade while moving in. Slow to activate but easy to use since it doesn't leave you open when guarded. Allows you to attack while taking opponent attacks with Super Armor.

base.name: Basic Quick Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

awakened.name: Awakening: Reiryoku Sealing Eyepatch - Removal
awakened.description: Kenpachi wrenches his back, looking to the sky as he tears off the only thing that can keep his power sealed. When Awakened, Kenpachi's Power and amount of maximum Reishi increases, enhancing Kenpachi's Kikon Moves to a devastating degree.

kisuke-urahara.name: Kisuke Urahara
kisuke-urahara.quote: There is nothing but fear reflected in your sword. When you dodge, you're afraid of getting killed. When you attack, you're afraid of killing someone.
kisuke-urahara.description: Former Captain of Squad 12 and founder of the Department of Research and Development, Urahara is a brilliant scientist and skilled strategist; since his exile, he spends his time running a small shop in the World of the Living. Kisuke is a Short Range fighter who utilizes Melee combat with a Trickster playstyle. His Balanced approach allows him to adapt to various situations through clever use of his tactical abilities. With well-rounded stats across Power, Speed, Range, Defense, and Technique, Kisuke can plan for all situations effectively while setting up elaborate combinations to guarantee victory.
kisuke-urahara.tldr: A mysterious, carefree shop owner. Can switch between offense and defense at any range. Has a balanced array of moves for a variety of situations. Specializes in preventing opponents from using their best moves, slowly wearing them down with long distance attacks that keep the opponent at bay. Overall power is very high but you're often left wide open, so taking care to land hits is key.

base.name: Signature Move: Too Bad, So Sad
base.description: Wield your blade to fend off opponent attacks. Taking a close-range attack transitions into a slash attack.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Kamisori Benihime
base.description: Releases Benihime to launch a slash. This is followed a moment later by more hits, which follow the first slash and seek out the opponent.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Are You Prepared?
base.description: Go all-out, strengthening yourself for a brief period. Attacks, Steps and Dashes are improved dramatically while the effect is active.

base.name: Basic Flash Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Heavy Byakurai
base.description: Unleash a Heavy Byakurai from the tip of your Zanpakuto. Has long range, making this a good move to keep foes at bay.

base.name: Basic Quick Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

awakened.name: Awakening: Shikai - Benihime
awakened.description: Urahara spawns a shield of bloody Reiryoku as he flickers with crimson Reiatsu, before shooting a serious glare and shattering the shield into glass-like fragments, fully releasing Benihime. When Awakened, Urahara regenerates his Reverse Gauge far faster, and also enhances the speed and rate of his Flash Steps and Reverse Actions.

awakened.name: Signature Move: Blood Shield
awakened.description: Triggers Blood Shield to recieve an attack. Taking a close-range attack transitions into a counter. Taking a long-range attack whilst 'Are You Prepared?' is active will launch a counter slash.

awakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Kamisori Benihime

kikon.name: Normal State Kikon Move 1: Hiasobi Benihime - Juzutsunagi
kikon.description: Kisuke slashes, spewing a net of black and red Reiryoku that weaves in a latticed pattern, and then slams the tip of Benihime into the ground, bubbling explosive oily orbs that detonate in a rupterous inferno. Destroys 2 Konpaku. Destroys 3 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 1: Hiasobi Benihime - Juzutsunagi
kikon.description: Kisuke slashes, spewing a net of black and red Reiryoku that weaves in a latticed pattern, and then slams the tip of Benihime into the ground, bubbling explosive oily orbs that detonate in a rupterous inferno. Destroys 3 Konpaku. Destroys 4 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 2: Hado #91 - Senjukotentaiho
kikon.description: Whilst Awakened, Kisuke waves Benihime with the authority of a military commander, directing the magical cannon fire of 'Hado #91: Senjukotentaiho' towards his opponent, resulting in a barrage and explosion of magenta star-like blasts. Destroys 4 Konpaku. Destroys 5 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

mayuri-kurotsuchi.name: Mayuri Kurotsuchi
mayuri-kurotsuchi.quote: I am a scientist. I don't care about good or evil. Everything in this world is my research material.
mayuri-kurotsuchi.description: Captain of Squad 12 and head of the Research and Development Institute. A brilliant but amoral scientist who views everything and everyone as potential research subjects, caring little for ethics in his pursuit of knowledge. As a Hybrid Range fighter, he combines calculated Melee attacks with various Ranged abilities, utilizing both Rushdown and Zoner playstyles through his extensive arsenal of modified body parts and tools. His 'Poison' Gauge mechanic allows him to keep pressure on his opponent, granting Mayuri limited-time damage buffs. adapt his strategy mid-battle. With high Technique and Range, moderate Power, but low Defense and Speed, Mayuri excels at controlling the battlefield through careful preparation and tactical, dominant superiority.
mayuri-kurotsuchi.tldr: The proud and ever-inquisitive Squad 12 Captain. Poisons foes and dictates their movements. Excels at distrupting opponents' rhythm by launching toxic bubbles with his Signature Move or pulling them in with his Special Flash Attack. Can easily strike enemy openings with Quick Attacks, Flash Attacks and Dashing Quick Attacks. However, his Special Flash Attack leaves him open, so be careful with timing his moves.

base.name: Exclusive Ability: Poison
base.description: An ability exclusive to Mayuri Kurotsuchi. Charges when certain attacks land on the opponent but reduces over time. Zanpakuto attacks consume a set percentage of the charge and gain added damage based on this amount. Poison does not impact additional damage on Reishi.

base.name: Signature Move: Toxic Bubbles
base.description: Launch a slow-moving ball of poison. Hit the opponent to add stocks of poison. Pressing the input again after launching causes the ball to explode, spreading poison in the area.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Flesh Bomb
base.description: A Breaker-type move that attaches a flesh bomb to the opponent. Has a narrow attack range and is slow to activate but cannot be guarded. After the bomb is attached and a certain amount of time passes, or the input is tapped again in the attack's combo cancel window, it will explode.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Move, You Idiot!
base.description: Send Nemu after the opponent. If hit, the opponent is restrained for a certain amount of time and then kicked upward for further attack. If Mayuri hits the opponent while they are restrained, Nemu will withdraw without following up. The lower the opponent's Reishi, the longer they are restrained.

base.name: Basic Flash Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Snake Belly Arm
base.description: Grab the enemy with an extension built into the left arm. Hitting the opponent pulls them into a more advantageous position. Hold the input to cover a longer distance.

base.name: Basic Quick Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

awakened.description: Mayuri grips Ashisogi Jizo and thrusts it to the sky, bubbling his blade as it erupts into the form of a colossal maggot adorned with the enlarged face and arms of a golden Jizo.

nelliel-tu-odelschwanck.name: Nelliel Tu Odelschwanck
nelliel-tu-odelschwanck.quote: We are not enemies. We are not friends, either. We are just two beings, passing time.
nelliel-tu-odelschwanck.description: Former Tercera Espada - and former Aspect of Sacrifice - who was betrayed and cast out of Las Noches by Nnoitra Gilga and Szayelaporro Granz. Despite her childlike alternate form, Nelliel is a powerful warrior who believes in honor and protecting those weaker than herself. As a Hybrid Range fighter, she combines Fast Melee combat with precise Ranged attacks, with her range increasing considerably once Awakening. Utilizing a unique reliance on her Signature Move Gauge mechanics and Charge abilities. Her versatile playstyle allows her to maintain pressure through quick attacks while building resources for devastating finishing moves. With outstanding Speed, balanced offensive stats, and solid Defense and Technique, Nelliel can adapt to any situation while maintaining consistent pressure on her opponents.
nelliel-tu-odelschwanck.tldr: A former Tres Espada who has reclaimed her power. Capable of instantly unleashing stored strength. A high-level fighter that can rattle her opponents with easy-to-use abilities. Closing distance is another strength with her standard attacks and steps. Her Special Flash Attack also lets her travel a long distance, so with the right timing you can move closer while dodging long-range attacks.

base.name: Exclusive Ability: Chase Stock
base.description: An ability exclusive to Nelliel. A gauge that fills with Cadena. Consume some of this gauge after certain moves to use follow-up attacks or additional actions.

base.name: Exclusive Ability: Vendaval
base.description: An ability exclusive to Nelliel. Perform a Step action after certain actions like Flash Attacks and Flash Attack Follow-Ups. This lets you prevent openings after attacks and consumes Chase Stock in the process.

base.name: Exclusive Ability: Cero
base.description: An move exclusive to Nelliel. Consume Chase Stock to activate. Press the Flash Attack input again after a Flash Attack Follow-Up to activate, following up with a Cero.

base.name: Signature Move: Cadena
base.description: Focus your spirit to accumulate Chase Stock. Hold the input to continue accumulating Chase Stock.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Viento de Esperanza
base.description: Step in and thrust your Zanpakuto forward to attack. Transitions to a combo attack on hit.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Deseo
base.description: Consume Chase Stock to activate. Repeat the same input after Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Viento de Esperanza to execute a powerful follow-up. Lets you transition into Vendaval after the attack.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Cero Sincretico
base.description: Summon Pesche and Donochakka to unleash Cero Sincretico. Hold the input to consume Chase Stock and raise its' power. You are defenseless while charging, and the move will be cancelled if Nelliel or her summoned companions are hit by an attack.

base.name: Basic Flash Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Valiente
base.description: Face the opponent and rush in for a cleaving strike. This rush has a long distance, making it a great move to home in and attack the enemy.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Orgullo
base.description: Consume Chase Stock to activate. Press the Flash Attack input again after Special Flash Attack Valiente to activate. Lets you transition into Vendaval after the attack.

base.name: Basic Quick Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

awakened.name: Awakening: Resurrección - Gamuza
awakened.description: Nelliel unleashes her Resurrección, Gamuza. Nelliel transitions into a centaur form, clad in fur and armor as all of her animations change drastically, and she gains new range options thanks to the new lance generated by Gamuza.

nnoitora-gilga.name: Nnoitora Gilga
nnoitora-gilga.quote: There is not a single person in heaven or on earth that can break me. Don't forget that I am the strongest Espada.
nnoitora-gilga.description: The Quinto Espada and the Aspect of Despair; Nnoitora is a ruthless, power-hungry warrior that has a terrible inferiority complex; he sees the battlefield as a man's domain, and will build a mountain of corpses to stand atop his prey. As a Short Range, Slow, Melee character, Nnoitora loves nothing more than tanking hits with his Hierro (Which works like a Stance; once used it cannot be used again until it is expired, and expires on hit or over time) and taking advantage of the new openings this durability grants him. By harnessing his Hierro, Nnoitora can obtain Super Armor for one hit, greatly reducing damage and negative knockback to allow him to use powerful Breaker moves, Charge attacks and combos. His mid-range game is limited, but can be a good Poking option.
nnoitora-gilga.tldr: The Quinto Espada is focused on foe-crushing strength. Considered the strongest Hierro among the Espada. A very close-range fighter who crushes opponenents with powerful attacks that cannot be guarded. His Special Flash Attacks, Spiritual Pressure Move 1 (charged), and Spiritual Pressure Move 2 are all unguardable. They are also hard to land and leave him wide open, but their power makes them worthwhile. Few of his moves have reach, so choose carefully to avoid being exploited.

base.name: Exclusive Ability: Block State
base.description: An ability exclusive to Nnoitora. Activates slightly after the activation of Signature Move 'Hierro'. Grants Super Armor affinity against Flash Attacks, Special Flash Attacks and Spiritual Pressure Moves that can prevent flinching from attacks, but the effect is lost on using these attack types.

base.name: Signature Move: Hierro
base.description: A move that hardens your skin. Enter 'Block State' when the move ends.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Flesh Bomb
base.description: Charge up a forceful leap to slam your foe with your Zanpakuto. The attack is slow to activate, but has wide range and impressive strength. Hold the input to render the attack stronger and unblockable.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Don't Run Away in Fear Now!
base.description: A Breaker-type move that unleashes a brutal launcher kick. Has a narrow attack range and is slow to activate but cannot be guarded. Send the opponent flying with a combo attack on hit, then unleash a Cero for massive damage.

base.name: Basic Flash Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: I'm the Strongest!
base.description: A Breaker-type move that unleashes a roundhouse kick. Has  a narrow attack range and is slow to activate but cannot be guarded. Transitions into an extremely powerful combo attack on hit.

awakened.name: Awakening: Resurrección - Santa Teresa
awakened.description: Nnoitora holds Santa Teresa to the moon, swirling a sandy yellow Reiryoku storm around the centre of the scythe's blades, as the thick crescent outline of his blade envelovs the area in shadow, emerging with his new, four-armed, mantis-like form gripping an equal number of colossal scythes.

awakened.name: Exclusive Ability: Block State
awakened.description: An ability exclusive to Nnoitora. Activates slightly after the activation of Signature Move 'Hierro'. Grants Super Armor affinity against Flash Attacks, Special Flash Attacks and Spiritual Pressure Moves that can prevent flinching from attacks, but the effect is lost on using these attack types.

awakened.name: Exclusive Ability: Bankai - Konjiki Ashisogi Jizo
awakened.description: An ability exclusive to Nnoitora. Grows extra arms when you have 4 Konpaku or less. All attacks boast greater hits, deal more damage, and deplete more of the Guard Gauge.

awakened.name: Signature Move: Hierro
awakened.description: A move that hardens your skin. Enter 'Block State' when the move ends.

awakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Flesh Bomb
awakened.description: Charge up a forceful leap to slam your foe with your Zanpakuto. The attack is slow to activate, but has wide range and impressive strength. Hold the input to render the attack stronger and unblockable.

awakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Don't Run Away in Fear Now!
awakened.description: A Breaker-type move that unleashes a brutal launcher kick. Has a narrow attack range and is slow to activate but cannot be guarded. Send the opponent flying with a combo attack on hit, then unleash a Cero for massive damage.

trivia: Nnoitora was mistakenly revealed by Bandai Namco a week early when they accidentally uploaded his Character Trailer after releasing Ikkaku Madarame's Character Trailer. This period of time is referred to in the Discord as the infamous 'Gilga Drought'.

rangiku-matsumoto.name: Rangiku Matsumoto
rangiku-matsumoto.quote: Don't apologize. You had your reasons, I'm sure. I don't really care about what they were. I just wish you would've had a little more faith in me.
rangiku-matsumoto.description: Lieutenant of Squad 10, serving under Captain Hitsugaya. Despite her carefree attitude and love of alcohol, Rangiku is a capable officer who hides deep emotional scars beneath her cheerful exterior. Rangiku is a Hybrid Range fighter who combines Melee combat with Ranged attacks and Kidō. Her Zoner playstyle allows her to control space and keep opponents where she wants them with her unique ash-based vortex abilities. With high Speed and Range, moderate Power, but lower Defense and Technique, Rangiku excels at maintaining distance while harassing opponents with her versatile moveset.
rangiku-matsumoto.tldr: The sensual Squad 10 Lieutenant. She ranges freely in battle with ashen blade in tow. Specializes in disrupting the opponent and dishing out damage from mid-range. Her strength lies in using a combination of her Signature Move to limit opponents' movement and her Special Flash Attack. Waging a steady fight while throwing in other moves to hide your intentions is key.

base.name: Signature Move: Hado #31 - Shakkaho
base.description: Unleashes a powerful Shakkaho forward. The projectile is slow, but the fireball has a huge hitbox, making it good for keeping opponents at bay.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: You're Too Slow!
base.description: Hunker down in a deep stance. Taking an attack in this stance triggers a Shakkaho counter.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Hado #33 - Sokatsui
base.description: Incant a Sokatsui that explodes right in front of you. Has a short range, but is extremely powerful, making it perfect for a combo finisher.

base.name: Basic Flash Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Lunge Slash
base.description: Step through a forward slice at the enemy. Moves quickly, letting you close the distance in an instant from mid-range. Because this Flash Attack turns into a combo hit, use as often and aggressively as you can.

base.name: Basic Quick Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

awakened.name: Awakening: Shikai - Haineko
awakened.description: Rangiku holds Haineko forward as the blade dissolves into ash, billowing from the hilt - This transitions into a cloud of ash, that separates as it spreads around the arena.

awakened.name: Exclusive Ability: Haineko Area
awakened.description: The signature ability of Rangiku Matsumoto. Use Signature Move 'Haineko Spread' or Spiritual Pressure Move 2 'Haikai' to generate a Haineko Area. Zanpakuto attacks resonate with the Haineko Area, inflicting attacks that deal damage.

awakened.name: Signature Move: Haineko Spread
awakened.description: Set up a Haineko Area with Haineko. The behaviour of the Haineko Area changes depending on how long you hold the input. A brief tap will set up a Haineko Area in front of you. Hold the input for a while, and the Haineko Area will follow you. Holding the input to full charge will create a Haineko Area that automatically chases the opponent.

awakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: You're Too Slow!
awakened.description: Hunker down in a deep stance. Taking an attack in this stance triggers a slash with Haineko to counter.

awakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Haikai
awakened.description: Generates a massive Haineko Area. This useful move spreads ash across a wide area, and lasts for a long time.

awakened.name: Basic Flash Attack
awakened.description: Moveset currently not known.
