renji-abarai.name: Renji Abarai
renji-abarai.quote: I haven't been fighting to defeat you. I've been fighting to win!
renji-abarai.description: Lieutenant of Squad 6 under Captain Kuchiki, Renji's fierce determination drives him to constantly improve. Childhood friends with Rukia Kuchiki, he strives to surpass his Captain while maintaining his street-smart attitude and loyalty to his friends. As a Hybrid Range fighter, he combines powerful Melee attacks with unique Ranged abilities, featuring a Giant Summon through his Awakening, that allows him to sweep massive areas of the battlefield using his Bankai, Hihio Zabimaru. His Balanced playstyle allows him to adapt to various situations while maintaining consistent pressure. With high Speed and Range, good Power and Defense, but lower Technique, Renji excels at overwhelming opponents with his small but consistent moveset and extending combos.
renji-abarai.tldr: The hothead, but caring, Squad 6 Lieutenant. Trounces foes in battle using his blade's variable length. A rare fighter that is balanced and able to fight from any range. Especially strong in mid-to-long-range combat with his astonishing Signature Move 'Sweep'. You will be left wide open, however, so it's important to use it in conjunction with other moves. Also, his Awakened state boasts overwhelming reach and attack power, letting him heavily sway the course of battle. However, his abilities decrease once his Bankai is gone, so make sure to time his Awakening carefully.

base.name: Signature Move: Sweep
base.description: Unfurl Zabimaru to strike a wide area. Huge attack area, and deals Reishi damage through Guard. However, it takes time to unleash, and striking with the tip does fewer hits. Additional inputs after hit lets you do up to two follow-up attacks, and can transition into Special Flash Attack: Leaping Slash mid-move.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Tsumuji Kaze
base.description: Brandish Zabimaru to spend your foe flying. Deals Reishi damage through Guard. You're invincible during the startup, letting you trigger this move to fend off attacks.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Oath of the Soul
base.description: Fire yourself up, dramatically boosting Signature Move strength, Guard Gauge depletion, and chip damage for a while.

base.name: Basic Flash Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Leaping Slash
base.description: A leaping slash with an unfurled Zabimaru. Takes time to unleash, but has a wide attack area and greatly depletes the Guard Gauge as well as dealing Reishi damage through Guard. Lets you move first when blocked.

base.name: Basic Quick Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

awakened.name: Awakening: Bankai - Hihio Zabimaru
awakened.description: A special Awakening for Renji Abarai. Activates Bankai, releasing Hihio Zabimaru. Continues for a set period of time, or until Renji's Reishi reaches 0%. All attacks are powered up during Bankai, and attacks no longer make you flinch due to the additional Super Armor.

awakened.name: Exclusive Ability: Haineko Area
awakened.description: The signature ability of Rangiku Matsumoto. Use Signature Move 'Haineko Spread' or Spiritual Pressure Move 2 'Haikai' to generate a Haineko Area. Zanpakuto attacks resonate with the Haineko Area, inflicting attacks that deal damage.

awakened.name: Signature Move: Grand Sweep
awakened.description: Sweep Hihio Zabimaru across a wide area. Consumes 15 Reiatsu when activated, and deals Reishi damage through Guard. The attack unleashes comparitively quickly, making it easy to use.

awakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Toguro Senpu
awakened.description: Coil Hihio Zabimaru around you before releasing it. Activates very quickly and sends the opponent flying on hit, letting you use it to turn the fight's momentum. Deals Reishi damage through Guard.

awakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Oath of the Soul
awakened.description: Fire yourself up, strengthening yourself for a brief period. Boosts attack power, Guard Gauge depletion, and chip damage.

awakened.name: Basic Flash Attack
awakened.description: Moveset currently not known.

awakened.name: Special Flash Attack: Grand Thrust
awakened.description: Extend Hihio Zabimaru in a straight line to attack. Very slow to unleash, but can reduce Reishi even when guarded.

awakened.name: Basic Quick Attack
awakened.description: Moveset currently not known.

weakened.name: Weakened: Post-Bankai State
weakened.description: The state after ending a Bankai, when a set period of time passed or Reishi is at 0%. Attack strength and range is weakened dramatically.

weakened.name: Signature Move: Hado #31 - Shakkaho
weakened.description: Take a stance to receive an attack. Taking an attack during this stance unleashes a counter by Hado #31 - Shakkaho. Shakkaho's explosion deals damage to anyone caught up in the blast - yourself included.

weakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Tsumuji Kaze
weakened.description: Spin to attack the area around you. Deals Reishi damage through Guard. Though it lacks range, you're invincible during the startup, letting you trigger this move to fend off attacks.

weakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Oath of the Soul
weakened.description: Fire yourself up, strengthening yourself for a brief period. Lets you use the same actions as in Normal State (Base). This dramatically boosts Signature Move strength, Guard Gauge depletion, and chip damage.

weakened.name: Special Flash Attack: Leaping Slash
weakened.description: A leaping slash. Its power and attack area are much weaker compared to Normal State.

rukia-kuchiki.name: Rukia Kuchiki
rukia-kuchiki.quote: I know the loneliness of being a prisoner. I know the joy you feel when your friends come to rescue you and the fear of them being injured and defeated.
rukia-kuchiki.description: An unseated Shinigami belonging to Squad 13; under the tutelage of Jushiro Ukitake and Kaien Shiba, she established herself as a permanent member of her Squad. One day, a fateful encounter with a certain orange-haired boy changes her life forever... Rukia is a Balanced character that excels in both Short Range Melee combat and Charge-compatible Kidō-based attacks. Her versatile moveset allows her to adapt to various situations while maintaining consistent pressure. With balanced stats across Power, Speed, Range, and Technique - but slightly lower Defense - Rukia is well-rounded but must be careful not to take too many direct hits.
rukia-kuchiki.tldr: A kind-hearted Shinigami whose speech is archaic. She pulls foes into range with her multi-hit moves. Excels at combat from close-to-mid-range and weaving together Signature Moves. Moves are straightforward and easy-to-use but lack strength individually. You'll need to carefully connect combos to rack up damage and achieve victory.

awakened.name: Awakening: Shikai - Sodenoshirayuki
awakened.description: Rukia holds her Zanpakuto as she spins it in a circle, mimicking the reflection of the pale white moon; he blade shimmers with permafrost, coating it in a white gleam, as a snow-white tassle flows from the sword's handle.

awakened.name: Signature Move: Hado #31 - Shakkaho
awakened.description: Fires a Shakkaho forward. Weak, but has long range and can be fired in succession. Hold the input to release a powerful short-range Shakkaho. This stronger Shakkaho can combo into moves like Rush Slash on hit.

awakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Somenomai, Tsukishiro
awakened.description: Leap back and unleash Tsukishiro. Warps to the opponent and triggers a huge ice pillar at their feet. You're invincible while leaping back, letting you trigger this move to fend off attacks.

awakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Tsuginomai, Hakuren
awakened.description: Stab Sodenoshirayuki into the ground to unleash Hakuren. While activated, you can stab the ground up to two more times to increase Hakuren's power.

sajin-komamura.name: Sajin Komamura
sajin-komamura.quote: I have no interest in whether I should live or die. But I do have an intense interest in protecting those who have protected me.
sajin-komamura.description: The loyal Captain of Squad 7, whose wolf-like appearance caused him to hide behind a mask. His unwavering loyalty to Yamamoto and sense of justice towards returning Kaname Tōsen to his senses drive him to protect Soul Society with his immense strength. As a Hybrid Range fighter, he combines powerful Slow Melee attacks with his Stance mechanics, where he can summon `Tenken` to augment his range and power. By Awakening, Sajin unleashes his Bankai, the Giant Summon Kokujō Tengen Myō'ō. His Berserker playstyle allows him to overwhelm opponents through raw power and determination, using his Awakening to guarantee victory, with the risk of losing it all if he mistimes his colossal Bankai. With exceptional Power and Defense, decent Range, but low Speed and Technique, Sajin dominates through unstoppable force and unwavering resolve.
sajin-komamura.tldr: The uncompromisingly dignified Squad 7 Captain. His great strength allows him to inflict major damage. His Tenken can be used from various distances, and the tremendous power of his Awakened state can pulverize opponents. Tenken attacks opponents with a huge sword and can be used at any range, making up for low mobility. Also, his Awakened state boasts incredible reach and offensive strength, turning the tide in your favour. However, his abilities decrease after Bankai ends, so proper timing of his Awakening is key.

base.name: Exclusive Ability: Activate Tenken
base.description: An ability exclusive to Sajin Komamura. Activates by performing Signature Move: Tenken - Preparation, changing his Signature Move to an attack using Tenken's ability.

base.name: Signature Move: Tenken - Preparation
base.description: Take a stance that gives you the properties of 'Activate Tenken'.

base.name: Signature Move: Tenken - Shou
base.description: Can be activated by holding the input during Signature Move: Tenken - Preparation. Thrust Tenken in front of you, attacking the area with the shockwave. Komamura can move with priority after the attack.

base.name: Signature Move: Tenken - Nagi
base.description: Can be activated by holding the input after a Flash Attack Follow-up during Exclusive Ability: Activate Tenken. Sweeps Tenken ahead of you to unleash a brutal follow-up on the opponent.

base.name: Signature Move: Tenken - Oh
base.description: Can be activated by holding the input after Special Flash Attack: Retaliation Sweep during Exclusive Ability: Activate Tenken. Unleash a backhand blow with Tenken's arm to brush the opponent away.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Divine Punishment
base.description: Summon Tenken's arm to shield yourself before rushing at the opponent. Has a wide attack range and the rush prevents flinching, making it good to force an offensive.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Imperial Authority
base.description: Summon Tenken and swing it straight down to bisect in front of you. Unleashing a brutal strike boasting wide attack range and great power. Has Super Armor that lets you attack while fending off the opponent's attack.

base.name: Basic Flash Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Retaliation Sweep
base.description: Stamp the ground and charge up power, then step into a slice at the enemy. This stance prevents flinching from opponent attacks, so this attack can be used to fend off attacks.

base.description: Moveset currently not known.

All attacks are powered up after an Awakening, and attacks no longer make you flinch due to the additional Super Armor.

awakened.description: Kukujo Tengen Myo-oh thrusts out its blade to unleash shockwave around you. Consumes 15 Reiatsu on activation. Allows for a special follow-up when activated from a Flash Attack Follow-Up or Special Flash Attack: 'Pierce'.

awakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Strike
awakened.description: Myo-oh swings its fist toward the opponent and unleashes a shockwave.

awakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Sever

weakened.name: Signature Move: Bite

weakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Form of Justice
weakened.description: Use your arm to shield yourself and rush at the opponent. Allows you to attack while taking opponent attacks with Super Armor.

weakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Stroke of Resolve
weakened.description: Swing your resolute blade down with all your might to bisect in front of you. Unleashes a brutal strike boasting incredible power. Has Super Armor, letting you attack even while taking the opponent's attack.

weakened.name: Special Flash Attack: Retaliation Sweep
weakened.description: Stamp the ground and charge up power, then step into a slice at the enemy. This stance prevents flinching from opponent attacks, so this attack can be used to fend off attacks.

shigekuni-genryusai-yamamoto.name: Shigekuni Genryusai Yamamoto
shigekuni-genryusai-yamamoto.quote: My flames are the very flames of creation. All things in the universe are born from fire, and all things in the universe will die by fire.
shigekuni-genryusai-yamamoto.description: The founding Captain-Commander of the Gotei 13, wielding the most powerful fire-type Zanpakuto. His stern leadership and overwhelming power has drove off countless threats, and has maintained order in Soul Society for over a thousand years. As a Short Range fighter, he combines devastating Melee combat with powerful Zoner abilities through his mastery over Ryujinjakka's flames. His unique Hellfire State mechanics and Inferno Gauge allow him to gradually increase the power of his flames, while his Charge attacks can instantly turn the tide of battle. With maximum Power and Defense, decent Range, high Technique, but minimal Speed, Yamamoto dominates through sheer destructive force and tactical positioning, burning all who dare oppose him to ash.
shigekuni-genryusai-yamamoto.tldr: The Head Captain has raw talent seen once a millenium. His flame Zanpakuto is able to turn all it touches to ash. His unique Inferno Gauge unleashes overwhelming fire power. Flash Attacks and Signature Moves charge the Inferno Gauge, and damage is based on how much of the gauge is charged. However, he takes care to play, since he enters a Hellfire State where Reishi continually decreases if the gauge is fully charged.

abilities.abilityQuote: All Things in the Universe, Turn to Ashes

base.name: Exclusive Ability: Inferno Gauge
base.description: A gauge exclusive to Shigekuni Genryusai Yamamoto, increases with the use of Flash Attacks or Signature Moves. Decreases over time or when hitting foes with Quick Attacks. The strength of his attacks increases in proportion to how much this gauge is filled. Enters Hellfire State when the gauge is maxed out.

base.name: Exclusive Ability: Hellfire State
base.description: An ability exclusive to Shigekuni Genryusai Yamamoto. A temporary special state triggered when the Inferno Gauge is maxed out. Attacks are dramatically stronger in Hellfire State, and Spiritual Pressure Move 2 changes to Nadegiri. In exchange, your Reishi constantly depletes while in Hellfire State.

base.name: Signature Move: Homuranagi
base.description: Slash in front of you to raze the area with massive flames. Powerful and leaves little opening, but dramatically raises the Inferno Gauge on activation. Unleash another slash with additional inputs. Cannot be activated during Hellfire State.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Shiranui
base.description: Unleash a veritable tornado of flame. Covers a wide area and can whittle away the opponent's Guard Gauge. Hold the input to delay htis move's activation time. The short input version is perfect for a combo finisher. The long input is slow to activate, but lets you use follow-up moves on hit.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Taimatsu
base.description: Only available in the Hellfire State. Slash while spinning to launch multi-hit flame projectiles. You're invincible during the startup, letting you trigger this move to fend off attacks. Reduces the Inferno Gauge to 0 on activation, and temporarily prevents it from rising.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Nadegiri
base.description: Taimatsu changes to this during the Hellfire State. Emit heat and slash over a wide area. Leaves a huge opening, but is extremely powerful. Hellfire State ends after activation.

base.name: Basic Flash Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Enmatoi
base.description: Rush forward wreathed in flames for a sweeping strike. Maintain the input to extend the rushing distance. This extended rush fills the Inferno Gauge.

base.name: Basic Quick Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

awakened.description: Only available in the Hellfire State. Slash while spinning to launch multi-hit flame projectiles. You're invincible during the startup, letting you trigger this move to fend off attacks. Reduces the Inferno Gauge to 0 on activation, and temporarily prevents it from rising.

awakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Nadegiri
awakened.description: Taimatsu changes to this during the Hellfire State. Emit heat and slash over a wide area. Leaves a huge opening, but is extremely powerful. Hellfire State ends after activation.

awakened.name: Basic Flash Attack
awakened.description: Moveset currently not known.

awakened.name: Special Flash Attack: Enmatoi
awakened.description: Rush forward wreathed in flames for a sweeping strike. Maintain the input to extend the rushing distance. This extended rush fills the Inferno Gauge.

awakened.name: Basic Quick Attack
awakened.description: Moveset currently not known.

kikon.name: Normal State Kikon Move 1: Ero No Hitonade
kikon.description: Whilst Unawakened, Yamamoto drapes Ryūjin Jakka in a semicircle, emblematic of the rising sun itself, as a halo of flames emerge from his blade and adorn his back. Yamamoto looses an effortless, but devastating strike backed by the full power of the sun itself. Destroys 2 Konpaku. Destroys 3 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 1: Ero No Hitonade
kikon.description: Whilst Awakened, Yamamoto drapes Ryūjin Jakka in a semicircle, emblematic of the rising sun itself, as a halo of flames emerge from his blade and adorn his back. Yamamoto looses an effortless, but devastating strike backed by the full power of the sun itself. Destroys 3 Konpaku. Destroys 4 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 2: Ennetsu Jigoku
kikon.description: Destroys 5. Destroys 6 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

shinji-hirako.name: Shinji Hirako
shinji-hirako.quote: Everything is opposite. Upside down, left is right, up is down. That's the way my world works.
shinji-hirako.description: Former Captain of Squad 5 who was exiled from Soul Society after Aizen Sosuke's betrayal, where he forcibly Hollowfied Shinji and his colleagues. His laid-back attitude masks both deep tactical intelligence and lingering bitterness, as his unique powers reflect his reversed worldview. As a Short Range fighter, he utilizes precise Melee combat with a unique Trickster playstyle. His Stance mechanics revolve around swapping between Sakanade and his sealed Zanpakuto, confusing his opponents, while his Rushdown capabilities allow him to capitalize on their confusion. With balanced stats favoring Power, Shinji excels at disorienting opponents before striking with devastating combos.
shinji-hirako.tldr: Leader of 'The Vizard', a band of outlaws. A cunning strategist who smoothly outwits foes. Can control strategy in close combat and seize the initiative. His Signature Move can be charged by holding the Signature Move input to switch between unguardable attacks and invincibility, requiring you to consider the situation. His Special Flash Attack covers a large distance, and you can hold the input to act first even if it's guarded.

base.name: Signature Move: Such Fun
base.description: Rotate Zanpakuto while walking forward. Can be activated with the listed input during Exclusive Ability: Sakanade Released. Being hit with any attack besides a Breaker-type while walking will unleash a slashing counter. However, if you do not get hit, you'll be left wide open afterwards.

base.name: Signature Move: That's Not It
base.description: Move that can be activated during Exclusive Ability: Sakanade Released. Rotate Zanpakuto while walking forward, then slash up into opponent with a Breaker Move. Once complete, moves to the back to perform a follow-up. Hitting the opponent enables a combo with a Flash Attack.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: It's Your Turn!
base.description: Sends Hiyori against the opponent. Shinji can move freely while Hiyori attacks. Fails if Hiyori is hit by the target.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Sakanade
base.description: A Breaker move that releases Sakanade and slashes the area to the front. Small range but cannot be guarded, and the first hit enables variations with successive attacks. Hitting puts you in Sakanade Released state where all attacks do more damage and Signature Move: 'That's Not It' can be activated.

base.name: Basic Flash Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Spinning Slash
base.description: Spin while stepping in and make a slash to the front. Has invincibility frames against Breakers while spinning. Hitting the opponent enables a combo with a Quick Attack.

base.name: Basic Quick Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

awakened.name: Awakening: Hollowfication
awakened.description: Shinji rakes at his face, donning his pharaoh-like Hollow mask, greatly augmenting his abilities.

kikon.name: Normal State Kikon Move 1: Cero
kikon.description: Destroys 2 Konpaku. Destroys 3 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 1: Cero
kikon.description: Destroys 3 Konpaku. Destroys 4 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 2: Collapse, Sakanade
kikon.description: Destroys 4 Konpaku. Destroys 5 Konpaku with a Soul Break. Puts you in a released state where all damage is increased and 'That's Not It' can be used.

shuhei-hisagi.name: Shūhei Hisagi
shuhei-hisagi.quote: I believe that fighting is not about being afraid or not. It's about standing up to face an enemy who you're afraid of.
shuhei-hisagi.description: Lieutenant of Squad 9 and skilled journalist for the Seireitei Communication magazine. Despite his fierce appearance, Hisagi is a thoughtful warrior who fears his own power and strives to embody justice in his former Captain's place after his betrayal. As a Hybrid Range fighter, he combines precise Melee combat with Ranged attacks and Kidō abilities. His 'Fear Gauge` mechanic and Ramper playstyle allow him to gradually build momentum through his Zanpakutō Kazeshini's unique properties, growing in strength as Hisagi and his opponent both take damage, creating a devastating slope of suffering. With high Speed and Range, moderate Defense, but lower Power and Technique, Hisagi excels at maintaining pressure through careful positioning and methodical attack patterns, building his strength - and therefore his confidence - slowly but surely.
shuhei-hisagi.tldr: Fear is the Squad 9 Lieutenant's strength. An all-around talent who excels in Zan Ken So Ki. Can use Special Flash Attacks and Signature Moves to fend off projectiles. His attack power is not the best, but he has excellent, easy-to-use moves that make for reliable performance in battle. A slow starter, the Exclusive Ability 'Fear' shows its true power when used later in battle.

base.name: Exclusive Ability: Fear
base.description: The signature ability of Shuhei Hisagi. You accumulate Fear when Awakenings occur or either fighter's Konpaku is destroyed. The higher the Fear, the more damage he deals to opponents, and some of his actions change.

base.name: Signature Move: Hado #58 - Tenran
base.description: Unleash Hado #58 - Tenran. Deals Reishi Damage even if blocked and greatly depletes the opponent's Guard Gauge. The attack area and hit count are boosted at higher Fear Counts.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Hado #31 - Shakkaho
base.description: Fires a powerful Shakkaho forward. Has superior range and activation, making it viable in many ways, including as a combo finisher.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Hado #33 - Sokatsui
base.description: Hado #31 - Shakkaho changes into this at Fear Count 7 or higher. Fires a powerful Sokatsui that detonates at the point of impact. Has superior range and activation, making it viable in many ways, including as a combo finisher.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Hado #54 - Haien
base.description: Hado #33 - Sokatsui changes into this at Fear Count 13 or higher. Fires a powerful Haien that detonates at the point of impact. Has superior range and activation, making it viable in many ways, including as a combo finisher.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: A Warrior's Poise
base.description: Take a stance to fend off attacks. Taking an attack in this stance triggers a powerful combo counter. The attack power is boosted at higher Fear Counts.

base.name: Basic Flash Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Sliding
base.description: Slide toward the enemy to slash with great force. You're invulnerable to enemy projectiles during this movement, letting you slip past them to attack. But be warned, if the slide hits at point-blank range, the slash will be blocked.

base.name: Basic Quick Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

awakened.name: Awakening: Shikai - Kazeshini
awakened.description: Hisagi tosses his blade aside, as it warps into a double-ended scythe, spinning in the air connected to a second scythe by a long chain, returning to Hisagi; after Awakening, Hisagi's Flash Attack changes, giving him good mid-range options, and further increasing the boosts provided by 'Exclusive Ability: Fear'.

awakened.description: Moveset currently not known.

kikon.name: Normal State Kikon Move 1: Blade That Knows Fear
kikon.description: Destroys 1 Konpaku. Destroys 2 Konpaku with a Soul Break. Destroys 2 Konpaku at Fear Count 5 or higher. Destroys 3 Konpaku at Fear Count 5 or higher with a Soul Break. Destroys 3 Konpaku at Fear Count 10 or higher. Destroys 4 Konpaku at Fear Count 10 or higher with a Soul Break.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 2: Inherited Techniques
kikon.description: Destroys 2 Konpaku. Destroys 3 Konpaku with a Soul Break. Destroys 3 Konpaku at Fear Count 10 or higher. Destroys 4 Konpaku at Fear Count 10 or higher with a Soul Break. Destroys 4 Konpaku at Fear Count 15 or higher. Destroys 5 Konpaku at Fear Count 15 or higher with a Soul Break. Destroys 5 Konpaku at Fear Count 20 or higher. Destroys 6 Konpaku at Fear Count 20 or higher with a Soul Break.

shunsui-kyoraku.name: Shunsui Kyoraku
shunsui-kyoraku.quote: It's not good to keep forcing yourself to fight. If you keep going like this, you'll lose your life.
shunsui-kyoraku.description: The laid-back Captain of Squad 8 and lifetime friend of Jushiro Ukitake, whose carefree demeanor belies his tactical genius and deadly fighting style. Despite his apparent laziness, he's one of Soul Society's most powerful and experienced Captains. As a Short Range fighter, he combines Melee combat with unique Ranged abilities through his dual-wielding style. His Gimmick mechanics revolve around his various 'Childrens Games' that are started by Awakening; after Awakening, one of three 'Childrens Games' will be chosen to play, being 'Draw', 'King of the Hill' and 'Tag'. Each of them have unique rules to remember, and gives Shunsui the possibility to fall into a devastating loss or unexpected victory through his Gambler playstyle; his Charge attacks reflect his unpredictable nature, allowing him to get an edge in these games, and to throw off his opponents. With high Defense, Technique, and balanced offensive stats, Shunsui excels at controlling the flow of battle through his various games, turning simple combat into deadly form of child's play.
shunsui-kyoraku.tldr: Squad 8 Captain and a refined dual wielder. Disrupts the flow of battle with his unique stance. Made for close combat with moves to easily control offense and defense at close-range. His Special Flash Attack covers a large distance at once, making it easy to close gaps. In addition to being able to seize the initiative in close combat, his personal skill is also useful on both attack and defense. Awakening activates 'Children's Game', which initiates special battle rules that change randomly.

abilities.abilityQuote: When the Flower Wind Rages, the Flower God Roars, When the Wind of Heaven Rages, the God of the Underworld Sneers

base.name: Signature Move: Mizukiri
base.description: Take a stance and spin to cleave the area around you. Hold the input to maintain the stance and charge up power, increasing the number of hits depending on the level of charge. No flinching while preparing the attack. You can control the spin to some extent during the powered-up version.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Bushogoma
base.description: Covers you in the power of wind, letting you spin to generate a cyclone. The cyclone heads toward the opponent upon release, growing gradually faster. The wind wraps around the opponent on impact, binding them for a short period.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: No Need To Panic
base.description: Move in front of the opponent with Flash Step and cut at them. Transitions into a combo attack on hit. Warps to the opponent, making it useful for a surprise attack from far away.

base.name: Basic Flash Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Leaping Slash
base.description: Leap toward the enemy with crossed blades to cut them. Lets you approach and attack instantly from mid-range.

base.name: Basic Quick Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

awakened.name: Awakening: Let's Play a Children's Game
awakened.description: Rangiku holds Haineko forward as the blade dissolves into ash, billowing from the hilt - This transitions into a cloud of ash, that separates as it spreads around the arena.

awakened.name: Exclusive Ability: Children's Game
awakened.description: An ability exclusive to Shunsui Kyoraku. Children's Game activates for a set period after Awakening. There are three types of games, which activate randomly: Chase the Devil, King of the Hill, or Quick Comparison. Special rules are imposed on the battle during activation.

awakened.name: Exclusive Ability: Chase the Devil
awakened.description: One player is chosen to be 'it' at random, and an icon appears over their head. Landing an attack on the other player will make them 'it' in turn. Neither character takes Reishi Damage while 'Chase the Devil' is in effect. When the counter on the icon reaches 0, or the damage they would've taken reaches a certain point indicated by the color of the icon, 'it' will explode, taking all of the damage from the period.

awakened.name: Exclusive Ability: King of the Hill
awakened.description: A circular area will surround both characters on activation. Anyone outside this circle while King of the Hill is in effect will gradually take Damage, but will not be reduced to 0% Reishi. The Fighting Spirit gauge also gradually fills while in the area.

awakened.name: Exclusive Ability: Quick Comparison
awakened.description: There are two signals after this effect begins: 'Get Ready' and 'Begin!'. After 'Begin!' is signaled, the first player to land a hit is declared the winner of the game, gaining 50 Reiatsu. Landing an attack before the 'Begin!' signal will give the victory to the character who is hit.

awakened.name: Signature Move: Mizukiri
awakened.description: Take a stance and spin to cleave the area around you. Hold the input to maintain the stance and charge up power, increasing the number of hits depending on the level of charge. No flinching while preparing the attack. You can control the spin to some extent during the powered-up version.

awakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: No Need To Panic
awakened.description: Move in front of the opponent with Flash Step and cut at them. Transitions into a combo attack on hit. Warps to the opponent, making it useful for a surprise attack from far away.

kikon.description: Destroys 2 Konpaku. Destroys 3 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 1: Are You Ready?
kikon.description: Destroys 3 Konpaku. Destroys 4 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 2: Hado #78 - Zangerin
kikon.description: Destroys 4 Konpaku. Destroys 5 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

trivia: King of the Hill was previously named 'Musical Chairs' in early versions, shown by a mislabeling in the launch version of Shunsui's character movelist card in-game.

soi-fon.name: Soi-Fon
soi-fon.quote: If your comrade is being defeated, you should see it as an opportunity. Rather than standing in the way, you should stab the enemy in the back. And if the enemy is so far above your level that you cannot even manage that, then you should let your comrade die. That is the way of the Onmitsukidō.
soi-fon.description: Captain of Squad 2 and Commander of the Stealth Force, Soi-Fon is a master of assassination and hand-to-hand combat. Her unwavering dedication to duty is matched only by her admiration for her former mentor, Yoruichi Shihōin. As a Short Range fighter, she excels in Melee combat with Kidō support, utilizing both Charge attacks and Gimmick mechanics - Specifically her Suzumebachi's special ability, 'Nigeki Kessatsu', which allows Soi-Fon to kill her opponent instantly if it hits twice. Her Rushdown playstyle is enhanced by unique Reloader and Instakill mechanics, making her especially deadly at both close and medium range. With maximum Speed, high Technique, decent Range, but low Power and Defense, Soi-Fon can quickly overwhelm opponents with rapid strikes and deadly precision.
soi-fon.tldr: The Squad 2 Captain swiftly and fatally pierces foes. Able to overwhelm opponents with her speed. Specializes in knocking her opponents around with overwhelming speed and multiple hits. Excels at linking Signature Moves and can fight a one-way battle of continual preemptive strikes. Doesn't have much Reishi, so it's important to keep attacking without letting your opponent know what you'll do next.

base.name: Signature Move: Anken
base.description: Quickly launch Anken blades concealed on your legs. Weak, but shoots out quickly, making it good for keeping foes at bay or covering openings. 2 Anken Stock are needed to activate Anken, which changes to Replenish when you're out.

base.name: Signature Move: Replenish
base.description: Anken changes to this when at 0 Anken Stock. Replenishes Anken on your legs. A short input replenishes 4 Anken Stock, while a long input replenishes 8 Anken Stock.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Kazaguruma
base.description: Move right before the enemy to unleash a kick. Hold the input for a powerful multi-hit attack. This state lets you into a Quick Attack or Flash Attack, depening on the level. Holding the input as long as possible changes this to Nigeki Kessatsu.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Nigeki Kessatsu
base.description: Hold the input as long as possible when activating Kazaguruma to change to this. Unlocks your Shikai, Suzumebachi, and attacks the enemy with a backstab. One hit confers a Hōmonka on the enemy. Hitting the enemy with Hōmonka on them again lets you destroy all of their Konpaku.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Bakudo #30 - Shitotsusansen
base.description: Unleash Shitotsusansen forward to bind the enemy. When it hits the opponent, follow up by slamming a powerful Hakuda into the opponent. Hold the input to unleash a powered-up Shitotsusansen. This version is unblockable, and binds the enemy for a long period of time.

base.name: Basic Flash Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Hineri Zenchugeri
base.description: Leap forward to unleash a spinning kick on the opponent. Lets you speed in and attack from far away. Transition into Anken to remove any openings.

base.name: Basic Quick Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

awakened.name: Awakening: Incomplete Shunko
awakened.description: Soi-Fon reaches her arm out, coating it in a wispy purple tornado of Reiryoku, perfectly blending Hakuda and Kido - When Awakened, Soi-Fon's Power increases, along with her Dash Speed.

awakened.name: Exclusive Ability: Recoil State
awakened.description: A special state unique to Soi-Fon. Granted when Bankai: Jakuho Raikoben is activated. Kikon Moves destroy 3 Konpaku less than usual in Recoil State.

kikon.name: Normal State Kikon Move 1: Kiten Hakuda
kikon.description: Destroys 2 Konpaku. Destroys 3 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 1: Incomplete Shunko
kikon.description: Destroys 3 Konpaku. Destroys 4 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 2: Bankai - Jakuho Raikoben
kikon.description: Destroys 5 Konpaku the first time this is activated in battle. Destroys 6 Konpaku with a Soul Break the first time this is activated in battle. Destroys 3 Konpaku each following time this is activated in battle. Destroys 4 Konpaku with a Soul Break each following time this is activated in battle -  After activation, you enter Recoil State for a set period of time.

awakenedCombos.name: Community Combo: Full Meter Cashout
awakenedCombos.description: Expend all of Soi-Fon's resources in an oppressive combo that overwhelms her foe. Requires 100 Reverse, 8 Anken, and at least 50 Reiatsu. Will not allow for a launcher at the end. Useful for pushing the opponent into Soul Break or into Now or Never. Created by '@kombat.'.

sosuke-aizen.name: Sōsuke Aizen
sosuke-aizen.quote: From the very start, no one has stood upon the heavens. Not you, not I, nor even gods. However, that intolerable vacuum has come to an end. Henceforth...I shall stand upon the heavens.
sosuke-aizen.description: Former Captain of Squad 5 who orchestrated a complex and devastating betrayal of Soul Society. His immense power is matched only by his ambition and masterful manipulation of others, all in pursuit of subjugating the Hōgyoku, transcending the boundaries between Shinigami and Hollow in order to form the Oken, and thus, to claim his throne atop the heavens. As a Short Range fighter, Aizen simply awaits his enemies, combining precise Melee combat with almighty defensive abilities that can negate damage. Aizen's unique Gimmick mechanic, the 'Hōgyoku Fusion Level' Gauge, which fuels his Ramper playstyle - This allows him to gradually increase in power throughout the battle, evolving into different forms that grow in power. Once Awakening to his Third Form, Aizen uses his Reviver perk that allows him to use his Reawakening and transcend the natural order of the world. With the highest stat total in the game, exceptional Power, Defense, and Technique, and decent Speed and Range, Aizen excels at methodically dismantling opponents through careful ability usage, strategic planning and constant evolution.
sosuke-aizen.tldr: The Squad 5 Captain. A traitor who weilds great power. Ranks among the mightiest in terms of Spiritual Pressure. His Fighting Spirit accumulates automatically. His Exclusive Ability: Hōgyoku Fusion - Second Phase gradually awakens his powers. Once in Chrysalis State, he can Awaken with additional Fighting Spirit. His Exclusive Ability: Inexhaustible Spiritual Power changes his Special Flash Attacks and Spiritual Pressure Moves according to his Spiritual Power Reserve. To evolve into his Chrysalis State, fill your Fighting Spirit to maximum. To evolve into his Broken Chrysalis State, use Awakening after filling your Fighting Spirit to maximum a second time. To evolve into his Complete Hōgyoku Fusion form, use Reawakening by losing all of your Konpaku with a third instance of a full Fighting Spirit Gauge.

base.name: Exclusive Ability: Inexhaustible Spiritual Power
base.description: An ability exclusive to Sosuke Aizen. The Reiatsu Gauge is replaced with a special version. Spiritual Power increases automatically, filling up to 5 stocks. The number of Stocked Spiritual Power changes some attack properties. Stopping in place speeds up Spiritual Power accumulation, with actions like attacks resetting the speed.

base.name: Exclusive Ability: Hōgyoku Fusion - Second Phase
base.description: An ability exclusive to Sosuke Aizen. Fighting Spirit increases over time from the start of battle, activating this when it maxes out. Fighting Spirit is reduced to 0%, but Sosuke Aizen changes form, and this move is replaced with a special version. Inexhaustible Spiritual Power is negated during Hōgyoku Fusion - Second Phase.

base.name: Exclusive Ability: Shatter, Kyōka Suigetsu
base.description: Sosuke Aizen's exclusive ability. Can only be activated in Normal State. Press the Awakening input when certain characters are performing Kikon Moves to consume two Reverse Gauge bars and negate Konpaku destruction once per battle. This Exclusive Ability is unable to be performed on Ichigo Kurosaki, Ichigo Kurosaki (Bankai), Ichigo Kurosaki (Final Getsugatensho), Uryu Ishida, Yasutora 'Chad' Sado, and Kaname Tōsen as they have never seen Aizen's Kyōka Suigetsu release.

base.name: Signature Move: Powerful Spiritual Pressure
base.description: Stand calmly with your left hand raised. Maintains this pose whilst the input is pressed, preventing flinching and reducing damage when attacked. Unleashes a shockwave forward when the input is released, or enough time passes. Taking an attack while in this stance makes you unleash a powerful shockwave, after which Spiritual Power instantly starts filling up at max speed.

base.name: Signature Move: A Process of Evolution
base.description: Powerful Spiritual Pressure changes into this during Hōgyoku Fusion - Second Phase. Stand calmly with your left hand raised. Maintains this pose whilst the input is pressed, preventing flinching and reducing damage when attacked. Unleashes a shockwave forward when the input is released, or enough time passes. Taking an attack while in this stance makes you unleash a powerful shockwave, after which you gain a lot of Fighting Spirit.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: El Escudo
base.description: Erect a wall of Spiritual Pressure around yourself. Activating this drains the Guard Gauge continuously and prevents flinching from enemy attacks. Released when the Guard Gauge reaches 0, putting you in Guard Break.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Hado #90 - Kurohitsugi
base.description: An immensely powerful Kurohitsugi attack. Can activate at Stocked Spiritual Power 1 or higher, consuming all stocks on activation. Starts with a forward sweep with Breaker properties. Unblockable, though it lacks range. The following Kurohitsugi increases when more Stocked Spiritual Power is consumed.

base.name: Basic Flash Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Assault
base.description: Approach and slash at the opponent. Sends the opponent flying on hit, letting you make some distance between you.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Hado #54 - Haien
base.description: Changes Assault at Stocked Spiritual Power 2 or higher. Unleashes a Haien forward. Boasts a fine balance of speed and power.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Hado #91 - Senjukotentaiho
base.description: Can activate at Stocked Spiritual Power 4 or higher. Unleashes a Senjukotentaiho forward. Hold the input to switch between this and Hado #54 - Haien. Slow to activate, but extremely powerful.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Kegeki
base.description: Special Flash Attack changes to this during Hōgyoku Fusion - Second Phase. Approach the opponent and launch a kick. Gives you the advantage in moving after the attack.

base.name: Basic Quick Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

awakened.name: Awakening: Chrysalis Shattering
awakened.description: Aizen's otherworldly cocoon splits apart, revealing Aizen's new, longer-haired form. Notably, Aizen seems to adopt more Hollow traits to his existing Shinigami form as his previously skin-tight shell now flows outwards like a godly, alien raiment.

awakened.name: Exclusive Ability: Inexhaustible Spiritual Power
awakened.description: An ability exclusive to Sosuke Aizen. The Reiatsu Gauge is replaced with a special version. Spiritual Power increases automatically, filling up to 5 stocks. The number of Stocked Spiritual Power changes some attack properties. Stopping in place speeds up Spiritual Power accumulation, with actions like attacks resetting the speed.

awakened.name: Exclusive Ability: Complete Hōgyoku Fusion
awakened.description: A signature Reawakened state for Sosuke Aizen. Activates at 0 Konpaku if you have enough Fighting Spirit for Reawakening.

awakened.name: Signature Move: Powerful Spiritual Pressure

reawakened.name: Reawakening: Birth of the New God
reawakened.description: Aizen falls, supposedly defeated, before being forcibly revived by the Hōgyoku. An impossible pillar of purple flaming Reiryoku swells, bursting with Aizen in the centre, reborn and ready to claim that intolerable vacancy in the heavens as the universe's new God.

reawakened.name: Exclusive Ability: Interdimensional Spiritual Power
reawakened.description: Spiritual Power is always maxed out, and does not go down.

reawakened.name: Signature Move: Origins of Spiritual Pressure
reawakened.description: Fend off opponent attacks with the glow from the Hōgyoku. Take an attack at just the right time and counter by slamming a ball of Spiritual Power into the opponent.

reawakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Power Transcending Shinigami and Hollow
reawakened.description: Release Spiritual Power, then sweep your blade while rushing forward. Fast activation makes this attack perfect for a combo finisher or an assault.

reawakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Hado #90 - Kurohitsugi
reawakened.description: A forward sweep with Breaker properties. Unblockable, though it lacks range. When it hits, unleashes a Kurohitsugi with devastating power.

reawakened.name: Basic Flash Attack
reawakened.description: Moveset currently not known.

reawakened.name: Special Flash Attack: Sword Pressure
reawakened.description: Lightly swing your blade to release sword pressure. Has a wide attack range and excellent activation, making it perfect for keeping foes at bay from mid-range.

reawakened.name: Basic Quick Attack
reawakened.description: Moveset currently not known.

kikon.name: Normal State Kikon Move 1: Standing at the Top
kikon.description: Destroys 2 Konpaku. Destroys 3 Konpaku with a Soul Break..

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 1: At the Edge of All Reason
kikon.description: Destroys 3 Konpaku. Destroys 4 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 2: At the Edge of All Reason
kikon.description: Destroys 4 Konpaku. Destroys 5 Konpaku with a Soul Break..

kikon.name: Reawakened Kikon Move 1: Full Incantation Hado #90 - Kurohitsugi
kikon.description: Destroys 4 Konpaku. Destroys 5 Konpaku with a Soul Break..

szayelaporro-granz.name: Szayelaporro Granz
szayelaporro-granz.quote: I am a perfect being! My body, mind, and powers are all perfect!
szayelaporro-granz.description: The Octava Espada and self-proclaimed 'perfect' Aspect of Madness. A twisted scientist obsessed with perfection who treats battle as an experiment, modifying his servants and opponents to be able to face any opponent while maintaining a facade of sophistication. As a Short Range fighter, he combines precise Melee combat with his unique and complex mechanics. After Awakening, Szayelaporro's Gambler playstyle comes into play as he makes full use of his 'Spiritual Pressure Understanding' Gauge, which is filled by advancing his 'Analysis Process' count through applying and retrieving 'Rokureichu' on his opponents. Each of the three stages of the 'Spiritual Pressure Understanding' Gauge supplies different buffs, with the random possibility to claim more Konpaku through his Kikon Moves, and even the possibility of activating his Reviver perk, rebirthing him with a small amount of Reishi and Konpaku. With exceptional Technique, moderate Speed and Range, but low Power and Defense, Szayelaporro excels at gradually dismantling opponents through careful analysis and tactical superiority. Most importantly, because of his Reviver capabilities, Szayelaporro starts with only 5 Konpaku, as opposed to the traditional 9 Konpaku.
szayelaporro-granz.tldr: The Octava Espada boasts a peerless life force. Augments his strength with careful analysis of foes. Has a special fighting style that involves analysing foes by collecting Rokureichu. Certain attacks plant Rokureichu in his opponent, and his Signature Move collects them. Collecting Rokureichu affects damage dealt, damage received, and the number of Konpaku destroyed for Kikon Moves. He starts with only 5 Konpaku, but he can endure long battles by using Rokureichu to power-up and his recovery move 'Gabriel' after Awakening.

base.name: Exclusive Ability: Rokureichu Count
base.description: An ability exclusive to Szayelaporro. A value accrued by planting Rokureichu on the opponent with certain attacks. Increases Analysis Progress Stage in proportion with the number of times planted in battle.

base.name: Exclusive Ability: Analysis Progress Stage
base.description: An Exclusive Ability of Szayelaporro. A stat improving in stages based on the times Rokureichu were planted in battle. The higher your Analysis Progress Stage, the more the Spiritual Pressure Analysis Level gauge is raised by Spiritual Pressure Move 2: I've Already Analysed Your Abilities!, and the fewer Rokureichu are required to use Signature Move: Retrieve Rokureichu.

base.name: Exclusive Ability: Spiritual Pressure Understanding Level
base.description: An Exclusive Ability of Szayelaporro. A power-up obtainable through Signature Move: Retrieve Rokureichu, and Spiritual Pressure Move 2: I've Already Analyzed Your Abilities!. Its main powers come after Awakening, but has benefits including reducing Reishi damage taken based on its level even in Normal State.

base.name: Signature Move: Retrieve Rokureichu
base.description: A Breaker-type move that closes in to grab the opponent. Does little damage to the opponent, but is unblockable. Recovers planted Rokureichu, raising your Spiritual Pressure Understanding Level.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: I Need Your Corpse Intact
base.description: Brandish your blade to provoke your opponent. Make a close-range attack in this stance to trigger a backstab counter behind your opponent. The counter plants Rokureichu.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: I've Already Analyzed Your Abilities!
base.description: An ability that increases your Spiritual Pressure Understanding Level gauge without consuming Rokureichu. The higher your Analysis Progress Stage, the more your Spiritual Pressure Understanding Level will be filled.

base.name: Basic Flash Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Plant Rokureichu
base.description: Approach quickly to attack. Low on power, but follows up by attaching a Rokureichu on the opponent.

base.name: Basic Quick Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

awakened.name: Exclusive Ability: Rokureichu Count
awakened.description: An ability exclusive to Szayelaporro. A value accrued by planting Rokureichu on the opponent with certain attacks. Increases Analysis Progress Stage in proportion with the number of times planted in battle.

awakened.name: Exclusive Ability: Analysis Progress Stage

The higher your Analysis Progress Stage, the more the Spiritual Pressure Analysis Level gauge is raised by Spiritual Pressure Move 2: I've Already Analysed Your Abilities!, and the fewer Rokureichu are required to use Signature Move: Retrieve Rokureichu.

awakened.name: Exclusive Ability: Spiritual Pressure Understanding Level
awakened.description: An Exclusive Ability of Szayelaporro. A power-up obtainable through Signature Move: Retrieve Rokureichu, and Spiritual Pressure Move 2: I've Already Analyzed Your Abilities!. Its main powers come after Awakening, but has benefits including reducing Reishi damage taken based on its level even in Normal State.

awakened.name: Exclusive Ability: Gabriel
awakened.description: An ability exclusive to Szayelaporro. Activates if at Spiritual Pressure Understanding Level 1 or above when your Konpaku fall to 0. Restores you 3 Konpaku, putting you back in the fight. Reaching Spiritual Pressure Understanding Level 3 allows you to revive up to twice.

awakened.name: Signature Move: Retrieve Rokureichu
awakened.description: A Breaker-type move that closes in to grab the opponent. Does little damage to the opponent, but is unblockable. Recovers planted Rokureichu, raising your Spiritual Pressure Understanding Level. This action is more powerful at Spiritual Pressure Understanding Level 2 or higher.

awakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: I Need Your Corpse Intact
awakened.description: Brandish your blade to provoke your opponent. Make a close-range attack in this stance to trigger a backstab counter behind your opponent. The counter plants Rokureichu. This action is more powerful at Spiritual Pressure Understanding Level 2 or higher.

awakened.name: Basic Quick Attack
awakened.description: Moveset currently not known.

kikon.name: Normal State Kikon Move 1: And Now, For the Finale
kikon.description: Destroys 2 Konpaku. Destroys 3 Konpaku with a Soul Break..

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 1: Teatro de Titere
kikon.description: A Kikon Move that makes a doll of the opponent, from which you take out and destroy organs. The destroyed organ is chosen at random, each of which destroys a different amount of Konpaku. The higher your Spiritual Pressure Understanding Level, the more likely you are to extract organs with better effects.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 1: Wrong Organ
kikon.description: Destroys 2 Konpaku. Destroys 3 Konpaku with a Soul Break..

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 1: Humerus (Húmero)
kikon.description: Destroys 3 Konpaku. Destroys 4 Konpaku with a Soul Break. Temporarily reduces enemy attack, and takes a big chunk out of their Guard Gauge.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 1: Lung (Pulmón)
kikon.description: Destroys 3 Konpaku. Destroys 4 Konpaku with a Soul Break. Temporarily halves the amount of Reiatsu earned by the opponent.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 1: Achilles Tendon (Tendón de Aquiles)
kikon.description: Destroys 3 Konpaku. Destroys 4 Konpaku with a Soul Break. Temporarily reduces the move speed of Steps/Dashes/normal movement.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 1: Stomach (Estómago)
kikon.description: Destroys 3 Konpaku. Destroys 4 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 1: Heart (Corazón)
kikon.description: Destroys 6 Konpaku. Destroys 7 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

tier-halibel.name: Tier Halibel
tier-halibel.quote: I don't want to become stronger through the power I gain by killing and sacrificing another. If I can't win alone, then I'll win as a group.
tier-halibel.description: The current Tres Espada and the Aspect of Sacrifice; Tier is a Rushdown Hybrid Range Melee character that utilises her unique Aura Gauge in order to boost her offensive capabilities; hitting enemies with attacks builds her Aura Gauge, and failing to land attacks after a short period of time decreases the Aura Gauge - Utilising her extreme combo potential and constantly beating her opponents down, Tier makes the most of her Gauge by never giving her opponent an inch. If the opponent gains distance, using Tier's Spiritual Pressure 1 Move, 'Ola Azul' will provide a good Poking option to keep her gauge up. After Awakening, Tier's range increases considerably, and further increases the buffs provided by her Aura Gauge.
tier-halibel.tldr: The Tres Espada seeks only a world without sacrifice. Her strength grows the longer she stays on the offensive. An offensive fighter that pounds opponents with attacks and covers distance with her high-powered Signature Move. Her Signature Move is a very effective forward rush that prevents opponents from escaping. Her personal Aura Gauge lets her power up by landing consecutive hits. Her low strength in Normal State means you'll need to keep attacking to keep her gauge high.

base.name: Exclusive Ability: Aura Gauge
base.description: Personal ability of Halibel. Landing a hit on the opponent fills the Aura Gauge, and when it's more than half full you enter a strengthened state. In this state, the power and number of hits for each move are increased. Reduced over time for a greater amount the more Reiatsu you have.

base.name: Signature Move: Corriente
base.description: A forward-facing move that travels quickly. Can transition into a variety of moves depending on the Quick Attack/Flash Attack inputs entered while in flight.

base.name: Signature Move: Aguja
base.description: Activate by pressing the Quick Attack input button during Corriente. Quickly thrust forward to perform an attack. Low power but leaves little opening for attack, so it's easy to use.

base.name: Signature Move: Fuerza Aguja
base.description: Activate by pressing the Flash Attack input button during Corriente. Build up power and then stab forward while advancing. High power but leaves you open.

base.name: Signature Move: Halt
base.description: Activate by pressing the Signature Move input button during Corriente. Put on the breaks and halt movement.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Ola Azul
base.description: Fill your blade with Reiatsu and send it flying. Low power but long range and can be canceled into Corriente after activating. If activated after a Flash Attack Follow-Up you can jump back and unleash 'Ola Azul'.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: I'll Show You
base.description: Fill your blade with Reiatsu and unleash a powerful upward slash. You're invincible until it triggers, so it can be used to fend off attacks. Follow up with consecutive attacks after hitting. Charges Aura Gauge by a lot.

base.name: Basic Flash Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Chain Thrust
base.description: Make a lunging hack at the opponent's chest and stab them repeatedly. Slow and with narrow range, but covers a great distance and won't leave you open long when it's guarded. Creates an opportunity to attack with Signature Move 'Corriente' afterwards.

base.name: Basic Quick Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

trivia: Halibel's artwork pose is a reference to her appearance in Chapter 315: `March of the Death`.

Oddly, Halibel is the only censored character in BLEACH - Rebirth of Souls; whereas characters like Soi-Fon and Yoruichi Shihōin have their Manga uncensored outfits, Halibel uses her Anime censored outfit.

toshiro-hitsugaya.name: Tōshirō Hitsugaya
toshiro-hitsugaya.quote: We are not gods. We're just Shinigami. The moment you started thinking you were a God was the moment you stopped improving.
toshiro-hitsugaya.description: The young prodigy Captain of Squad 10, wielding the strongest ice-type Zanpakutō. Despite his age, Tōshirō's tactical brilliance and dedication to duty have earned him respect among the Gotei 13. Tōshirō is a Hybrid Range fighter who utilizes both Melee and 'Tenso Jyurin' Gauge-based abilities. Keeping the offensive on your opponents whilst avoiding being hit by attacks allow him to make the most of his 'Tenso Jyurin' Gauge. With high Power and Range, moderate Defense and Technique, but lower Speed, Tōshirō can dominate the battlefield through his Balanced playstyle and Charge attacks, using careful positioning and resource management to send his foes to an icy grave.
toshiro-hitsugaya.tldr: The Squad 10 Captain is the youngest ever in that role. His leadership is reinforced by a mighty ice Zanpakuto. Can seize the initiative with a variety of moves to keep opponents at bay and shower the enemy with attacks through power-ups. With a number of excellent projectiles, his strength lies in fending off the opponent from mid-range and then lunging in for relentless attacks. His Special Flash Attack is a long-range projectile good for keeping back distant enemies. Successive hits with ice-based attacks increase his personal Tenso Jyurin, Control over Weather Level, which boosts certain moves.

base.name: Exclusive Ability: Tenso Jyurin
base.description: A gauge exclusive to Toshiro Hitsugaya. The gauge fills when you land ice-based attacks on the opponent. Filling the gauge increases your Tenso Jyurin, Control over Weather Level. At Level 2, this strengthens all moves, and at Level 3 the gauge begins to deplete, but the power boost increases further for a while.

base.name: Signature Move: Hyochu Senga
base.description: Attack opponents within range with icicles stabbing up from their feet. Hold the input to expand the range in which the icicles appear. The initial range and range expansion speed are boosted at higher Tenso Jyurin, Control over Weather levels.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Soten Hyogeki
base.description: Drop a block of ice down on the opponent. Binds the opponent on hit, allowing follow-ups depending on range.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Hyoryu Renbu
base.description: Generates an ice dragon to launch at the opponent. Huge attack area, and is stronger when it lands at close range. Greatly fills the Tenso Jyurin, Control over Weather Gauge on hit.

base.name: Basic Flash Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Hyogeki
base.description: Generates a block of ice he unleashes forward. Slow but has a long range. Can be used to keep the enemy at bay, or you can chase the ice to attack the opponent. The ice block gets larger and can hit more times at Tenso Jyurin, Control over Weather Level 3.

base.name: Basic Quick Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

awakened.name: Awakening: Bankai - Daiguren Hyōrinmaru
awakened.description: Tōshirō lifts Hyōrinmaru to the heavens, swirling a freezing cloud around him as his blade spews ice, forming grand draconic wings and a long, serpentine tail that sit upon Tōshirō's back - His arm, now adorned with an ice dragon that bites his Zanpakuto, erupts from the cloud with a chilling fury.

awakened.name: Exclusive Ability: Tenso Jyurin
awakened.description: A gauge exclusive to Toshiro Hitsugaya. The gauge fills when you land ice-based attacks on the opponent. Filling the gauge increases your Tenso Jyurin, Control over Weather Level. At Level 2, this strengthens all moves, and at Level 3 the gauge begins to deplete, but the power boost increases further for a while.

kikon.description: Destroys 4 Konpaku. Destroys 3 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

ulquiorra-shifar.name: Ulquiorra Shifar
ulquiorra-shifar.description: The Cuatro Espada and the Aspect of Nihility; ruthless and unfeeling, Ulquiorra stands as Aizen's last bastion of Las Noches, guarding the captive Orihime Inoue. A sign of one of Ulquiorra's victims is the hole punched through his opponents' chest; a grim reflection of his own emptiness. Ulquiorra is a Hybrid Range fighter combining Fast Melee attacks with devastating Ranged abilities. His Balanced playstyle and unique Vampiric mechanics allow him to not only shed his Reishi to ehance his attacks, but also allows him to regenerate his Reishi over time. With excellent Speed and Range, moderate Power, but lower Defense and Technique, Ulquiorra excels at swift, precise strikes while maintaining pressure through his energy-based attacks; additionally, Ulquiorra is one of few characters in the game with access to a Reawakening, further exceeding his already high limits through the power of Segunda Etapa.
ulquiorra-shifar.tldr: The Cuatro Espada, borne of the void. Rapidly regains Reishi and has two tiers of power release. Can attack with oppressive forece by performing combos with his Signature Move Cero and Spiritual Pressure Move 1 Cero. These moves consume Reishi but deal high damage and can be used in a variety of ways, such as to cover openings after an attack. Fully charging Fighting Spirit after Awakening lets him Reawaken.

base.name: Signature Move: Cero
base.description: Unleash a small-scale Cero. Consumes your Reishi on activation, but is easy to use and boasts incredible power. You can cancel various attacks into this move.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Cero
base.description: Unleash a powerful Cero. Consumes your Reishi on activation, but boasts devastating power. A versatile move with fast activation, letting you activate it under all sorts of conditions.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Instant Regeneration
base.description: Activates Ulquiorra's Instant Regeneration ability, where Reishi recovers over time after activation, continuing for a set period of time or until you take damage from an attack. Hold the input to boost the amount recovered.

base.name: Basic Flash Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Trunk Cleave
base.description: Close in quickly for a cleaving strike. Rushes in quickly to attack a wide area, letting you commence the attack from mid-range. Can transition into Cero after the attack.

base.name: Basic Quick Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

awakened.name: Awakening: Resurrección - Murciélago
awakened.description: Ulquiorra hovers upwards, like the moon rising in the night sky, pointing his blade at his foe as a rupturous flurry of blackened green Reiryoku raindrops spread across the arena like thick needles, blanketing the sky. Ulquiorra emerges, donning a long, flowing robe, his Hollow mask altered, and spawning two vampiric-looking bat wings.

reawakened.name: Reawakening: Resurrección - Segunda Etapa
reawakened.description: Ulquiorra swells even further with black Reiryoku as his wings spread outward, forming a typhoon of swirling nihilsm. After the vortex clears, his new, bat-like form is apparent, clad in black, sleek fur and having lost his Hollow mask.

uryu-ishida.name: Uryū Ishida
uryu-ishida.quote: The man's name was Sôken Ishida. He was my teacher... And my Grandfather. I'm glad Orihime isn't here. I wouldn't want her to see this... On my honor as a Quincy... I'm going... To kill you.
uryu-ishida.description: A young man from Karakura Town that claims to be 'The Last Quincy'. He encounters Ichigo Kurosaki after taunting him into a Hollow-slaying contest that quickly escalates. The echoes of his race's past linger in his mind, and forces Uryū to face extreme adversity. Uryū is a Long Range character that makes use of a wide variety of Ranged attacks. He has a Balanced playstyle, and is one of few characters in the game who has a Reawakening. Be wary of Uryū's miniscular Defense, Speed and Power - It's best to avoid attacks and to pick at opponents from a range, making use of Uryū's various techniques to overpower your enemies.
uryu-ishida.tldr: A proud Quincy. Pierces foes with a variety of ranged skills. Has multiple projectiles and excels in mid-to-long-range combat. Not good at close-range, so make sure to stay away from your opponent. Quick Attacks are special in that what you transition to depends on whether his bow attacks land. Fully charge your Fighting Spirit after Awakening to enter a Reawakened state.

abilities.abilityName: And the victor of this battle is me
abilities.abilityQuote: The right to choose life or death lies with the victor

base.name: Exclusive Ability: Reishi Concentration State
base.description: A signature upgrade state for Uryu Ishida. Entering Reishi Concentration State adds a Reishi Concentration Gauge and powers up your attacks. The Reishi Concentration Gauge goes down over time.

base.name: Signature Move: Licht Regen
base.description: Shoot upward to rain a barrage of arrows down onto your foe. Hold the input to shower more arrows down. Use a forward or backwards movement input the moment you release this to shift the point of impact forward or backward. Always rains down the maximum number of arrows in Reishi Concentration State.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Quincy Arrow
base.description: Fires an arrow forward. Move in front of the enemy with Hirenkyaku on hit and follow up with a barrage of countless arrows. A mighty move perfect for a combo finisher.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Seeleschneider
base.description: Take a stance for a Seeleschneider. Take an attack during this pose to unleash a powerful counter with Seeleschneider. A successful counter triggers Reishi Concentration State.

base.name: Basic Flash Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Heavy Shot
base.description: A long-range attack launched forward. Flies far to strike at distant foes. Hold the input for a stronger projectile. Hits multiple times with boosted strength in Reishi Concentrated State.

base.name: Basic Quick Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

awakened.name: Awakening: Ransōtengai
awakened.description: Uryu Ishida's Awakened state. Trigger by Awakening when Fighting Spirit is at max. Uryu manipulates his body through threads of Reiryoku, enhancing his damage output and increasing the amount of Reiatsu he can store.

awakened.name: Exclusive Ability: Reishi Concentration State

reawakened.name: Reawakening: Quincy Letz Stile
reawakened.description: Uryu Ishida's Reawakened state. Trigger by Awakening while in Awakened state when Fighting Spirit is at max. Uryu snaps one of the prongs of his Sanrei Glove, breaking his commitment to his Grandfather and instilling within him the true power of `The Last Quincy`. Uryu's outfit changes, and his mastery over Reishi is exponentially enhanced. It is currently not known exactly what this Reawakening does to Uryu in regards to gameplay.

reawakened.name: Exclusive Ability: Reishi Concentration State
reawakened.description: A signature upgrade state for Uryu Ishida. Entering Reishi Concentration State adds a Reishi Concentration Gauge and powers up your attacks. The Reishi Concentration Gauge goes down over time.

kikon.name: Normal State Kikon Move 1: Swift Arrow
kikon.description: Whilst Unawakened, Uryu draws his bowstring, charging a powerful Heilig Pfeil before loosing it upon his foe in a powerful, precise blast. Destroys 2 Konpaku. Destroys 3 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 1: Swift Arrow
kikon.description: Whilst Awakened, Uryu draws his bowstring, charging a powerful Heilig Pfeil before loosing it upon his foe in a powerful, precise blast. Destroys 3 Konpaku. Destroys 4 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 2: Sprengen
kikon.description: Whilst Awakened, Uryu launches five Seeleschneider in a pentagon pattern, stabbing a final Seeleschneider in the center of the pentagon, holding out a Ginto filled with Reishi, tipping it onto the central Seeleschneider to cause a dramatic and erupting explosion. Destroys 4 Konpaku. Destroys 5 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

kikon.name: Reawakened Kikon Move 1: Final Arrow
kikon.description: Whilst Reawakened, Uryu draws his bow backwards, abandoning the promise he made to his master, firing an unbelievable blast of Reiryoku towards his foe. Destroys 5 Konpaku. Destroys 6 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

yasutora-chad-sado.name: Yasutora 'Chad' Sado
yasutora-chad-sado.description: A gentle giant of Mexican-Japanese descent and one of Ichigo's closest friends. Chad's tremendous physical strength is matched only by his loyalty, following a promise made to his Abuelo to use his power to protect others rather than for personal gain. Chad is a Short Range fighter who excels in Melee combat with a Slow but powerful Berserker playstyle. His Charge attacks allow him to power through enemy defenses with explosive force while maintaining offensive pressure. With outstanding Power and Defense, decent Speed, but low Range and Technique, Chad is a tank who can take hits while dealing massive damage up close. I can't imagine him losing.
yasutora-chad-sado.tldr: A gentle giant whose silence belies a secret oath. A powerful fighter with a mighty fist. Specializes in putting the pressure on opponents with his high damage move 'Penetracion'. Combine with high-power Spiritual Pressure Move 'Contraataque' and try to achieve a Soul Break.

base.name: Exclusive Ability: Impact Gauge
base.description: A gauge exclusive to Yasutora 'Chad' Sado. Fills up through Agresión. Filling this up completely changes his Signature Move to Penetracion.

base.name: Signature Move: Agresión
base.description: Take a stance and charge up power. Press the input again to consume the Impact Gauge and release a shockwave from your fist. Use Step while charging to move while maintaining the Impact Gauge. Filling up the Impact Gauge completely changes this to Penetracion.

base.name: Signature Move: Penetracion
base.description: Agresión changes to this with a full Impact Gauge. Consume the entire Impact Gauge to unleash a brutal blow, dealing proportional damage to the oppponent's Reishi. There is a Guard Point at the moment of activation, letting you take opponent attacks while triggering it. Does more damage the closer you are to the opponent.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Alerta
base.description: Clench your fist, strengthening yourself for a brief period. Attacks are stronger while this is active, and the Impact Gauge fills from Agresión more quickly.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Contraataque
base.description: Move that throws an uppercut punch while stepping forward. Gains Super Armor, and attack strength will rise if you receive enemy attacks during the move. However, Breaker-type attacks cannot be resisted.

base.name: Basic Flash Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Right Straight
base.description: Put your weight into a right straight. Lets you rush in quickly to attack, closing the distance. Transitions quickly into Agresión on hit, letting you fill the Impact Gauge.

base.name: Basic Quick Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

awakened.name: Awakening: Brazo Derecha de Gigante y Brazo Izquierda Del Diablo
awakened.description: Chad calls forth the power of his demonic left arm, Brazo Izquierda Del Diablo, wrapping it in a Hollow-white armor as the shield on his right arm grows larger; when Awakened, Chad's offensive capabilities are enhanced as he now mixes both of his arms into his attacks.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 1: El Directo
kikon.description: Destroys 3 Konpaku. Destroys 4 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 2: La Muerte
kikon.description: Destroys 4 Konpaku. Destroys 5 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

yoruichi-shihoin.name: Yoruichi Shihōin
yoruichi-shihoin.quote: Were you afraid? That's your problem. You're focusing too much on what's to come.
yoruichi-shihoin.description: Former Captain of Squad 2 and ex-commander of the Stealth Force, Yoruichi is known as the 'Flash Goddess' for her unmatched speed. Despite her noble heritage, she chose exile to help her childhood friend, Kisuke Urahara. Yoruichi is a Short Range fighter specializing in Fast Melee combat and Kidō techniques. Her Rushdown playstyle makes her a relentless and swift attacker who can quickly overwhelm opponents with her light but rapid strikes. Boasting extreme Speed and high Technique, with decent Range, but lower Power and Defense, Yoruichi excels at poking tactics and creating offensive pressure through dominating combos that leave little room to breathe or escape.
yoruichi-shihoin.tldr: The 'Flash Master', an expert in rapid Hohō and close combat. She overwhelms her foes through mastery of these skills. Can seize the initiative to close in on opponents and rack up damage. Attacking from a step or dash strengthens her moves, making it easy to maintain an offensive flow. Has low Reishi, so it's important to find a way to keep attacking the opponent without being interrupted.

base.name: Exclusive Ability: Flash Master
base.description: The signature ability of Yoruichi Shihoin. Strengthens moves unleashed during a Step or Dash.

base.name: Signature Move: Flash Breaker
base.description: Rotate on the spot. You're invincible while spinning, letting you fend off enemy attacks. Slide in any direction while triggering while Flash Master is active.

base.name: Signature Move: Anken
base.description: Swing your leg to launch 2 dark Anken blades. Although weak, they have long range and can keep foes at bay. You can slide in any direction while launching the Anken while Flash Master is active.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Bakko
base.description: Rush forward and punch the enemy, slamming a ball of Reiatsu into them. Activates quickly, making it viable in many ways, including as a combo finisher. The attack triggers faster while Flash Master is active, and your charge covers more distance.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Oboro Neko
base.description: Take a stance for unleashing afterimages. Take an attack during this stance to unleash a swift, multi-hit counter. Warps to the opponent to counterattack, making this effective even at long range.

base.name: Basic Flash Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Shorai
base.description: Use a palm strike, then launch a ball of Reiatsu to attack. Takes time to unleash, but attacks a wide area. The palm strike is a Breaker, and is unblockable at point-blank range. Slide forward to attack while Flash Master is active.

base.name: Basic Quick Attack
base.description: Moveset currently not known.

awakened.name: Awakening: Complete Shunko
awakened.description: Yoruichi reaches her arm out, coating it and her back in an electric yellow storm of Reiryoku, perfectly blending Hakuda and Kido - When Awakened, Yoruichi's Speed and Power increases dramatically, making her one of the fastest characters in the game.
